                  def participant?(rel, user)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                    rel.coach_id == user.id || rel.client_id == user.id
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  def validate_params
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate limit parameter
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:limit].present?
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                      limit = params[:limit].to_i
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless limit.between?(1, 100)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Limit must be between 1 and 100" } },
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :bad_request
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate date parameters
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:date_from].present?
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless parse_date(params[:date_from])
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Invalid date_from format. Use ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD)" } },
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :bad_request
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:date_to].present?
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless parse_date(params[:date_to])
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Invalid date_to format. Use ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD)" } },
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :bad_request
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate cursor parameter
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:before].present?
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless valid_cursor_format?(params[:before])
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Invalid cursor format" } },
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :bad_request
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                        nil
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                  def valid_cursor_format?(cursor)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                    return false if cursor.blank?
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                      raw = Base64.urlsafe_decode64(cursor)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                      parts = raw.split(":", 2)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                      return false unless parts.length == 2
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Validate date format
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                      Date.iso8601(parts[0])
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Validate ID format (should be numeric)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                      Integer(parts[1])
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                      true
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ArgumentError, TypeError
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                      false
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  # ---------- keyset cursor helpers ----------
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                  def encode_cursor(date, id)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                    # date in YYYY-MM-DD, opaque to clients
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                    Base64.urlsafe_encode64("#{date.iso8601}:#{id}")
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                  def decode_cursor(cur)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                    return [ nil, nil ] if cur.blank?
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                      raw = Base64.urlsafe_decode64(cur)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                      d, i = raw.split(":", 2)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                      return [ nil, nil ] unless d && i
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                      date = Date.iso8601(d)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                      id = Integer(i)
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                      [ date, id ]
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ArgumentError, TypeError => e
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.warn "Invalid cursor format: #{cur[0..20]}... - #{e.message}"
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                      [ nil, nil ]
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                  def parse_date(val)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                    return nil if val.blank?
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                      Date.iso8601(val)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ArgumentError => e
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.warn "Invalid date format: #{val} - #{e.message}"
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                      nil
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      195.

    app/controllers/api/v1/dashboard_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    56 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 56 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            module Api
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              module V1
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                class DashboardController < ApplicationController
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/dashboard
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Params:
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                  #   from, to: ISO8601 dates/times (optional)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                  #   tz: IANA TZ (defaults to current_user.timezone or "UTC")
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  #   sections: comma list to limit payload (e.g., "inbox,velocity,streaks")
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  def show
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                    window = extract_window(params, current_user)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                    sections = parse_sections(params[:sections])
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                    data = DashboardDataService.new(user: current_user, window:, sections:).call
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                    # ETag/Last-Modified for cheap conditional GETs
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                    etag = [ "dash-show", current_user.id, data[:digest], window[:from]&.to_i, window[:to]&.to_i, sections.sort ].join(":")
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                    fresh_when etag:, last_modified: data[:last_modified] || Time.current, public: false
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Small private cache; iOS will still revalidate via ETag
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                    response.set_header("Cache-Control", "private, max-age=60")
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: data, status: :ok
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue DashboardDataService::ValidationError => e
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { code: "validation_error", message: "Invalid parameters", details: e.details }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue DashboardDataService::TooExpensiveError
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { code: "timeout", message: "Dashboard query took too long" }, status: :request_timeout
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/dashboard/stats
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Params:
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  #   from, to, tz (same as above)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  #   group_by: "day" | "week" | "month" (default: "day")
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  #   limit: integer (default 30, max 365)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  def stats
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                    window = extract_window(params, current_user)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                    group_by = %w[day week month].include?(params[:group_by]) ? params[:group_by] : "day"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                    limit = [ [ params[:limit].to_i, 1 ].max, 365 ].min rescue 30
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                    stats = DashboardDataService.new(user: current_user, window:).stats(group_by:, limit:)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                    etag = [ "dash-stats", current_user.id, stats[:digest], window[:from]&.to_i, window[:to]&.to_i, group_by, limit ].join(":")
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                    fresh_when etag:, last_modified: stats[:last_modified] || Time.current, public: false
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                    response.set_header("Cache-Control", "private, max-age=60")
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: stats, status: :ok
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue DashboardDataService::ValidationError => e
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { code: "validation_error", message: "Invalid parameters", details: e.details }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  private
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  # from/to can be date or datetime; coerce to Time in the user's TZ and clamp to sane bounds.
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  def extract_window(p, user)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                    tz = p[:tz].presence || user&.timezone.presence || "UTC"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                    Time.use_zone(tz) do
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                      from = parse_time(p[:from]) || 30.days.ago
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                      to   = parse_time(p[:to])   || Time.zone.now
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Ensure from <= to and bound range to 400 days to prevent runaway queries
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                      if from > to
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                        from, to = to, from
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                      if (to - from) > 400.days
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                        from = to - 400.days
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                      { from:, to:, tz: }
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue ArgumentError
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise DashboardDataService::ValidationError.new(details: { tz: [ "invalid timezone" ] })
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  def parse_time(val)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                    return nil if val.blank?
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                    Time.zone.iso8601(val) rescue Time.zone.parse(val) rescue nil
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                  def parse_sections(raw)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                    return [] if raw.blank?
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                    raw.to_s.split(",").map!(&:strip).reject!(&:blank?) || []
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      85.

                  # GET /api/v1/devices

                  def index
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                      devices = build_devices_query
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Check if pagination is requested
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                      if params[:page].present? || params[:per_page].present?
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Apply pagination
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                        page = [ params[:page].to_i, 1 ].max
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                        per_page = [ params[:per_page].to_i, 1 ].max.clamp(1, 50)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                        offset = (page - 1) * per_page
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                        paginated_devices = devices.limit(per_page).offset(offset)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                          devices: paginated_devices.map { |device| DeviceSerializer.new(device).as_json },
          
      27.

                          pagination: {
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                            page: page,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                            per_page: per_page,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                            total: devices.count,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                            total_pages: (devices.count.to_f / per_page).ceil
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      33.

      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Return simple array for backward compatibility
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: devices.map { |device| DeviceSerializer.new(device).as_json }
          
      37.

      38.

                    rescue => e

                      # Handle nested parameters

                      platform = device_params[:platform] || (device_params[:apns_token].present? ? "ios" : "android")

                        platform = "ios" # Default to iOS when generating token

                    rescue => e
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Device registration failed: #{e.message}"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to register device" } },
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH/PUT /api/v1/devices/:id
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                  def update
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                      service = DeviceManagementService.new(user: current_user)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                      device = service.update_device(
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                        device: @device,
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                        attributes: device_params
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: DeviceSerializer.new(device).as_json
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => e
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Device update validation failed: #{e.record.errors.full_messages}"
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Validation failed", details: e.record.errors.full_messages } },
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Device update failed: #{e.message}"
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to update device" } },
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                  # DELETE /api/v1/devices/:id
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  def destroy
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                      @device.destroy
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                      head :no_content
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Device deletion failed: #{e.message}"
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to delete device" } },
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/devices/test_push
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                  def test_push
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                      device = current_user.devices.find(params[:device_id])
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                      service = DeviceManagementService.new(user: current_user)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                      result = service.send_test_push(device: device)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                      if result[:success]
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: result
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: result[:error] } }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Resource not found" } }, status: :not_found
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Test push failed: #{e.message}"
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to send test push" } },
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                  private
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                  def set_device
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                    @device = current_user.devices.find(params[:id])
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "Resource not found" } }, status: :not_found
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                  def device_params
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                    params.permit(:apns_token, :platform, :bundle_id, :fcm_token, :device_name, :os_version, :app_version, :locale)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                  def validate_device_params
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Only validate basic format issues, let model validation handle the rest
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                    # This maintains backward compatibility with existing tests
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate string length limits (these are hard limits that should be caught early)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:device_name].present? && params[:device_name].length > 255
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Device name too long (maximum 255 characters)" } },
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:os_version].present? && params[:os_version].length > 50
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "OS version too long (maximum 50 characters)" } },
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:app_version].present? && params[:app_version].length > 50
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "App version too long (maximum 50 characters)" } },
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                      nil
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                  def build_devices_query
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                    devices = current_user.devices.includes(:user)
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply platform filter
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:platform].present?
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                      platform = params[:platform].to_s.downcase
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                      if %w[ios android].include?(platform)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                        devices = devices.where(platform: platform)
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply active status filter
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:active].present?
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                      active_value = case params[:active].to_s.downcase
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                      when "true", "1", "t", "yes", "y" then true
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                      when "false", "0", "f", "no", "n" then false
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                      else nil
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                      devices = devices.where(active: active_value) unless active_value.nil?
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply search filter
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:search].present?
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                      search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                      devices = devices.where(
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

                        "device_name ILIKE ? OR os_version ILIKE ? OR app_version ILIKE ?",
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                        search_term, search_term, search_term
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply ordering
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                    order_by = params[:order_by] || "created_at"
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                    order_direction = params[:order_direction]&.downcase == "asc" ? "asc" : "desc"
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

                    case order_by
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "device_name"
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                      devices = devices.order("device_name #{order_direction}")
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "platform"
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                      devices = devices.order("platform #{order_direction}")
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "last_seen_at"
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

                      devices = devices.order("last_seen_at #{order_direction}")
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

                      devices = devices.order("created_at #{order_direction}")
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                    devices
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                  def validate_pagination_params
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate page parameter
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:page].present? && params[:page].to_i < 1
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Page parameter must be a positive integer" } },
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate per_page parameter
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:per_page].present? && (params[:per_page].to_i < 1 || params[:per_page].to_i > 50)
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Per page parameter must be between 1 and 50" } },
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate order_by parameter
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:order_by].present?
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

                      valid_order_fields = %w[created_at device_name platform last_seen_at]
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless valid_order_fields.include?(params[:order_by])
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Invalid order_by parameter" } },
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :bad_request
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate order_direction parameter
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:order_direction].present?
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless %w[asc desc].include?(params[:order_direction].downcase)
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Order direction must be 'asc' or 'desc'" } },
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :bad_request
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate search parameter length
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:search].present? && params[:search].length > 100
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Search term too long (maximum 100 characters)" } },
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

                      nil
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      310.

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    278 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 278 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            module Api
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              module V1
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

                class ListSharesController < ApplicationController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :set_list, only: %i[index create show update destroy update_permissions accept decline]
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :set_list_share, only: %i[show update destroy update_permissions accept decline]
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :authorize_list_user, only: %i[index create update update_permissions]
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :authorize_share_user_or_list_user, only: %i[destroy]
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :authorize_share_access, only: %i[show]
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :validate_share_params, only: %i[create update update_permissions]
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :validate_pagination_params, only: [ :index ]
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/lists/:list_id/shares
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  def index
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                      shares = build_shares_query
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Check if pagination is requested
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                      if params[:page].present? || params[:per_page].present?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Apply pagination
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                        page = [ params[:page].to_i, 1 ].max
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                        per_page = [ params[:per_page].to_i, 1 ].max.clamp(1, 50)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                        offset = (page - 1) * per_page
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                        paginated_shares = shares.limit(per_page).offset(offset)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                          shares: paginated_shares.map { |share| ListShareSerializer.new(share).as_json },
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                          pagination: {
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                            page: page,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31.
