                            per_page: per_page,
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                            total: shares.count,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                            total_pages: (shares.count.to_f / per_page).ceil
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                        }
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Return simple array for backward compatibility
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: shares.map { |share| ListShareSerializer.new(share).as_json }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "ListSharesController#index error: #{e.message}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to retrieve shares" } },
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/lists/:list_id/shares/:id
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  def show
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: ListShareSerializer.new(@list_share).as_json
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "ListSharesController#show error: #{e.message}"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to retrieve share" } },
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/lists/:list_id/shares
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  def create
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                      # ---- Spec: empty body / missing email -> 400 Bad Request with { error: { message: "Email is required" } }
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                      if params.blank? || params[:email].to_s.strip.blank?
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                        return render json: { error: { message: "Email is required" } }, status: :bad_request
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                      email = params[:email].to_s.downcase.strip
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                      role  = params[:role].presence || "viewer"
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Validate role before proceeding
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless %w[viewer editor admin].include?(role)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                        return render json: { error: { message: "Invalid role. Must be 'viewer', 'editor', or 'admin'" } },
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :unprocessable_content
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                      # If already shared, return the existing share (spec expects OK rather than error)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                      if (existing_share = @list.list_shares.find_by(email: email))
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                        return render json: ListShareSerializer.new(existing_share).as_json, status: :ok
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                      invited_user = User.find_by(email: email)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                      @list_share =
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                        if invited_user
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                          # existing user -> create accepted/pending based on your model logic
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                          @list.share_with!(invited_user, share_params.merge(role: role))
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                        else
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                          # non-existent user -> pending invite
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                          @list.invite_by_email!(email, role, share_params)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                      if @list_share.persisted?
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: ListShareSerializer.new(@list_share).as_json, status: :created
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.error "Share creation validation failed: #{@list_share.errors.full_messages}"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Validation failed", details: @list_share.errors.as_json } },
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :unprocessable_content
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Create share failed: #{e.class}: #{e.message}"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to create share" } },
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/lists/:list_id/shares/:id
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  def update
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                      if @list_share.update(share_params)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: ListShareSerializer.new(@list_share).as_json
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.error "Share update validation failed: #{@list_share.errors.full_messages}"
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Validation failed", details: @list_share.errors.as_json } },
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :unprocessable_content
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Share update failed: #{e.message}"
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to update share" } },
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/lists/:list_id/shares/:id/update_permissions
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  def update_permissions
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                      if @list_share.update_permissions(permission_params)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: ListShareSerializer.new(@list_share).as_json
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.error "Permission update validation failed: #{@list_share.errors.full_messages}"
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Validation failed", details: @list_share.errors.as_json } },
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :unprocessable_content
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Permission update failed: #{e.message}"
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to update permissions" } },
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                  # DELETE /api/v1/lists/:list_id/shares/:id
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  def destroy
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                      @list_share.destroy
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                      head :no_content
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Share deletion failed: #{e.message}"
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to delete share" } },
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/lists/:list_id/shares/:id/accept
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  def accept
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                      # If a token is provided but doesn't match, spec expects this exact error:
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                      if params.key?(:invitation_token)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                        given = params[:invitation_token].to_s
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                        expected = @list_share.invitation_token.to_s
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                        if given.blank? || given != expected
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                          return render json: { error: { message: "Invitation is not pending" } }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                      # If the share has no token or is not pending, return error
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                      if @list_share.invitation_token.blank? || !@list_share.pending?
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                        return render json: { error: { message: "Invitation is not pending" } }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                      @list_share.accept!(current_user)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                      @list_share.reload
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: ListShareSerializer.new(@list_share).as_json, status: :ok
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Share acceptance failed: #{e.message}"
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to accept invitation" } },
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/lists/:list_id/shares/:id/decline
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                  def decline
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless @list_share.pending?
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                        return render json: { error: { message: "Invitation is not pending" } }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                      @list_share.decline!
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { message: "Invitation declined" }
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Share decline failed: #{e.message}"
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to decline invitation" } },
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                  private
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                  def set_list
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                    @list = List.find(params[:list_id])
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                  def set_list_share
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                    @list_share = @list.list_shares.find(params[:id])
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_list_user
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                    unless @list.user == current_user
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Only list user can manage shares" } }, status: :forbidden
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_share_access
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                    return if @list.viewable_by?(current_user) || @list_share.user == current_user
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "Unauthorized" } }, status: :forbidden
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_share_user_or_list_user
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                    return if @list.user == current_user || @list_share.user == current_user
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Default: assume they're trying to delete a share they don't own
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "Only list user or share user can delete this share" } }, status: :forbidden
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                  def share_params
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                    params.permit(:can_view, :can_edit, :can_add_items, :can_delete_items, :receive_notifications)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                  def permission_params
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                    permitted = params.require(:permissions).permit(:can_view, :can_edit, :can_add_items, :can_delete_items, :receive_notifications)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                    permitted.to_h.transform_values do |v|
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                      case v
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                      when true, false then v
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                      when nil, ""     then false
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                        v.to_s.strip.downcase.in?(%w[true yes on 1])
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                  def build_shares_query
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                    shares = @list.list_shares.includes(:user)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply status filter
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:status].present?
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

                      status = params[:status].to_s.downcase
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                      if %w[pending accepted declined].include?(status)
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                        shares = shares.where(status: status)
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply role filter
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:role].present?
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                      role = params[:role].to_s.downcase
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

                      if %w[viewer editor admin].include?(role)
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                        shares = shares.where(role: role)
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply search filter
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:search].present?
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                      search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

                      shares = shares.where("email ILIKE ?", search_term)
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply ordering
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

                    order_by = params[:order_by] || "created_at"
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

                    order_direction = params[:order_direction]&.downcase == "asc" ? "asc" : "desc"
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

                    case order_by
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "email"
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

                      shares = shares.order("email #{order_direction}")
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "role"
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
            

                      shares = shares.order("role #{order_direction}")
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "status"
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

                      shares = shares.order("status #{order_direction}")
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "invited_at"
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

                      shares = shares.order("invited_at #{order_direction}")
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

                      shares = shares.order("created_at #{order_direction}")
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            
              
            

                    shares
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

                  def validate_share_params
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Only validate basic format issues, let model validation handle the rest
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

                    # This maintains backward compatibility with existing tests
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate email format if present (allow whitespace that gets normalized)
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:email].present?
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
            

                      normalized_email = params[:email].to_s.strip.downcase
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless normalized_email.match?(/\A[^@\s]+@[^@\s]+\z/)
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Invalid email format" } },
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :bad_request
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate boolean permissions
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

                    boolean_fields = %w[can_view can_edit can_add_items can_delete_items receive_notifications]
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

                    boolean_fields.each do |field|
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            
              
            

                      if params[field].present?
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
            

                        value = params[field].to_s.downcase
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            
              
            

                        unless %w[true false 1 0 t f yes no y n on off].include?(value)
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            
              
            

                          render json: { error: { message: "Invalid #{field} value" } },
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

                                 status: :bad_request
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            
              
            

                          return
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            
              
            

                  def validate_pagination_params
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate page parameter
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:page].present? && params[:page].to_i < 1
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Page parameter must be a positive integer" } },
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate per_page parameter
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:per_page].present? && (params[:per_page].to_i < 1 || params[:per_page].to_i > 50)
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Per page parameter must be between 1 and 50" } },
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate order_by parameter
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:order_by].present?
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            
              
            

                      valid_order_fields = %w[created_at email role status invited_at]
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless valid_order_fields.include?(params[:order_by])
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Invalid order_by parameter" } },
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :bad_request
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate order_direction parameter
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:order_direction].present?
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless %w[asc desc].include?(params[:order_direction].downcase)
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Order direction must be 'asc' or 'desc'" } },
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :bad_request
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate search parameter length
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:search].present? && params[:search].length > 100
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Search term too long (maximum 100 characters)" } },
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            
              
            

                      nil
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      355.

    app/controllers/api/v1/lists_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    199 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 199 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # app/controllers/api/v1/lists_controller.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            module Api
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              module V1
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

                class ListsController < ApplicationController
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :set_list, only: [ :show, :update, :destroy, :members, :share, :unshare ]
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :authorize_list_view!, only: [ :show, :members ]
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :authorize_list_edit!, only: [ :update ]
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :authorize_list_owner!, only: [ :destroy, :share, :unshare ]
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/lists/validate/:id (convenience check)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  def validate_access
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                    list = List.find_by(id: params[:id])
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                    unless list
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render json: { list_id: params[:id], accessible: false, error: "List not found" }, status: :not_found
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                    can_access = can_view?(list)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: {
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                      list_id: list.id,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                      accessible: can_access,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                      owner: can_access ? list.user&.email : nil
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/lists
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  def index
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                    owned_ids  = List.where(user_id: current_user.id).select(:id)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                    shared_ids = ListShare.where(user_id: current_user.id, status: ListShare.statuses[:accepted]).select(:list_id)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                    scope = List.where(id: owned_ids).or(List.where(id: shared_ids)).distinct
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                    # since filter (optional)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:since].present?
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                      since_time =
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                        begin
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                          Time.zone.parse(params[:since])
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                        rescue
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                          nil
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                      scope = scope.where("lists.updated_at >= ?", since_time) if since_time
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                    active = scope.where(deleted_at: nil)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { lists: active.map { |l| serialize_list(l) }, tombstones: [] }, status: :ok
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/lists/:id
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  def show
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: serialize_list(@list, include_tasks: true), status: :ok
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/lists
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  def create
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    # specs treat an empty body as 422
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                    cleaned_params = params.except(:controller, :action, :list).permit(:name, :description, :visibility, :due_date, :strict_mode).to_h
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                    if cleaned_params.blank? && !params.key?(:name)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Validation failed", details: [ "Name can't be blank" ] } }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                    list = current_user.owned_lists.new(list_params_flat)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                    list.visibility = "private" # default
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                    if list.save
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: serialize_list(list), status: :created
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                      validation_error!(list)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/lists/:id
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  def update
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                    if @list.update(list_params_flat)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: serialize_list(@list), status: :ok
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                      validation_error!(@list)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  # DELETE /api/v1/lists/:id
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                  def destroy
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                    @list.class.delete(@list.id)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                    head :no_content
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/lists/:id/share
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  # params: user_id or email (required), can_edit (optional)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                  def share
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                    target_id = params[:user_id]
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                    target_email = params[:email]
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Check if both user_id and email are missing
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                    if target_id.blank? && target_email.blank?
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render json: { errors: { email: [ "is required" ] } }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                    # If email is provided, find user by email
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                    if target_email.present?
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                      user = User.find_by(email: target_email)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render json: { errors: { email: [ "User not found" ] } }, status: :unprocessable_entity unless user
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                      target_id = user.id
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
