      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Get user's email for ListShare model
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                    user = User.find(target_id)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                    share = ListShare.find_or_initialize_by(list_id: @list.id, email: user.email)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                    share.user_id = target_id
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                    share.status   = :accepted
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                    share.can_view = ActiveModel::Type::Boolean.new.cast(params[:can_view])
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                    share.can_edit = ActiveModel::Type::Boolean.new.cast(params[:can_edit])
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                    share.can_add_items = ActiveModel::Type::Boolean.new.cast(params[:can_add_items])
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                    share.can_delete_items = ActiveModel::Type::Boolean.new.cast(params[:can_delete_items])
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                    if share.save
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: {
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                        id: share.id,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                        user_id: share.user_id,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                        email: share.email,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                        can_view: share.can_view,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                        can_edit: share.can_edit,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                        can_add_items: share.can_add_items,
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                        can_delete_items: share.can_delete_items,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                        status: share.status,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                        created_at: share.created_at,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                        updated_at: share.updated_at
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                      }, status: :created
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                      validation_error!(share)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/lists/:id/unshare
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                  # params: user_id (required)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                  def unshare
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                    target_id = params[:user_id]
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                    return validation_error_message!("user_id is required") if target_id.blank?
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                    share = ListShare.find_by(list_id: @list.id, user_id: target_id)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                    share&.destroy!
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: serialize_list(@list), status: :ok
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/lists/:id/members
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                  def members
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                    owner = { id: @list.user_id, role: "owner" }
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                    members = @list.list_shares.includes(:user).map do |s|
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                      { id: s.user_id, role: "member", can_edit: s.can_edit }
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { owner: owner, members: members }, status: :ok
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  private
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  # === Auth & authz helpers ===
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                  def require_auth!
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                    return if current_user.present?
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "Unauthorized" } }, status: :unauthorized
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                  def set_list
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                    @list = List.find_by(id: params[:id])
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                    not_found unless @list
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_list_view!
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                    return if can_view?(@list)
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                    forbidden
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_list_edit!
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                    return if can_edit?(@list)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                    forbidden
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_list_owner!
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                    return if owns?(@list)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                    forbidden
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                  def owns?(list)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                    list.user_id == current_user.id
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  def can_view?(list)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                    return true if owns?(list)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                    ListShare.exists?(list_id: list.id,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                                      user_id: current_user.id,
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                                      status: ListShare.statuses[:accepted])
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                  def can_edit?(list)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                    return true if owns?(list)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                    ListShare.exists?(list_id: list.id,
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                                      user_id: current_user.id,
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                                      status: ListShare.statuses[:accepted],
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                                      can_edit: true)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                  # === Params & serializers ===
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Specs send flat params; support both flat and nested.
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                  def list_params_flat
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:list].present?
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                      params.require(:list).permit(:name, :description, :visibility)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                      params.permit(:name, :description, :visibility)
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                  def serialize_list(l, include_tasks: false)
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                    payload = {
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                      id: l.id,
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                      name: l.name,
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                      description: l.description,
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                      visibility: l.visibility,
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                      user_id: l.user_id,
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                      deleted_at: l.deleted_at,
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                      created_at: l.created_at,
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                      updated_at: l.updated_at
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                    if include_tasks
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                      tasks = l.tasks.where(deleted_at: nil).order(:due_at)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                      payload[:tasks] = tasks.map do |t|
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                        {
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                          id: t.id, title: t.title, note: t.note, due_at: t.due_at,
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                          status: t.status, created_at: t.created_at, updated_at: t.updated_at
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                        }
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                    payload
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      233.

                  def validation_error!(record)

    249.

                           status: :unprocessable_entity

                  def validation_error_message!(msg)
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "Validation failed", details: { base: [ msg ] } } },
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                           status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                  end

                  # POST /api/v1/lists/:list_id/memberships
          
      52.

                  def create
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Find user by email or ID
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    target_user = find_user_by_email_or_id(membership_params[:user_identifier])
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                    unless target_user
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render json: { error: "User not found" }, status: :not_found
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Check if user is already a member
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                    if @list.members.include?(target_user)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render json: { error: "User is already a member of this list" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Check if user is trying to invite themselves
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                    if target_user == current_user
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render json: { error: "Cannot invite yourself" }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                    @membership = @list.memberships.build(
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                      user: target_user,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                      role: membership_params[:role] || "viewer"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                    authorize @membership
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                    if @membership.save
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: {
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                        membership: {
          
      80.

                  def destroy

                    head :no_content

                  private
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  def set_list
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                    @list = List.find(params[:list_id])
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                    authorize @list, :show?
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                  def set_membership
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                    @membership = @list.memberships.find(params[:id])
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                  def membership_params
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Only permit user_identifier, handle role separately for security
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                    permitted = params.require(:membership).permit(:user_identifier)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Handle role separately with explicit validation
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:membership][:role].present?
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                      role = params[:membership][:role].to_s.downcase
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                      if %w[editor viewer].include?(role)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                        permitted[:role] = role
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                        permitted[:role] = "viewer" # Default to viewer for invalid roles
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                      permitted[:role] = "viewer" # Default role
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                    permitted
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  def find_user_by_email_or_id(identifier)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Try to find by ID first (if it's a number)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                    if identifier.match?(/^\d+$/)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                      User.find_by(id: identifier)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Otherwise, try to find by email
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                      User.find_by(email: identifier)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      166.

                  def index

                    begin

                      logs = build_notifications_query

    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Apply pagination at database level
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                      page = [ params[:page].to_i, 1 ].max
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                      per_page = per_page_limit
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                      offset = (page - 1) * per_page
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                      paginated_logs = logs.limit(per_page).offset(offset)

    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: paginated_logs.map { |notification|

    18. 
            

            
              
            

                        NotificationSerializer.new(notification).as_json
          
      19.

                  # PATCH /api/v1/notifications/:id/mark_read
          
      28.

                  def mark_read
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                      notification = current_user.notification_logs.find(params[:id])

                      notification.mark_read!
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                      head :no_content

                  # PATCH /api/v1/notifications/mark_all_read
          
      43.

                  def mark_all_read
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Use bulk update for better performance
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                      NotificationLog.for_user(current_user)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .where("metadata->>'read' IS NULL OR metadata->>'read' != 'true'")
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .update_all("metadata = jsonb_set(metadata, '{read}', 'true')")
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50.

                  private

                  def build_notifications_query
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                    logs = NotificationLog.for_user(current_user).recent
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply read filter at database level using scopes
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params.key?(:read)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                      read_value = parse_read_filter(params[:read])
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                      case read_value
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                      when true
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                        logs = logs.read
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                      when false
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                        logs = logs.unread
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                    logs
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                  def parse_read_filter(value)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                    case value.to_s.downcase
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "true", "1", "t", "yes", "y", "read"   then true
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "false", "0", "f", "no", "n", "unread" then false
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                    else nil
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  def per_page_limit
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                    per = params[:per_page].to_i
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                    per = 10 if per <= 0
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                    per = 50 if per > 50
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                    # If there are many notifications and no per_page specified, use 50
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:per_page].blank? && NotificationLog.for_user(current_user).count > 20
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                      per = 50
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                    per
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                  def validate_page_params
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate page parameter
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:page].present? && params[:page].to_i < 1
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Page parameter must be a positive integer" } },
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate per_page parameter
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:per_page].present? && (params[:per_page].to_i < 1 || params[:per_page].to_i > 50)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Per page parameter must be between 1 and 50" } },
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate read parameter
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:read].present?
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                      valid_read_values = %w[true false 1 0 t f yes no y n read unread]
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless valid_read_values.include?(params[:read].to_s.downcase)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Invalid read parameter value" } },
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :bad_request
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                        nil
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                end

              end

                  def show

                  # POST /api/v1/recurring_templates

                  def create
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                      list = find_authorized_list(params[:list_id])
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                      return if performed? # Early return if error was rendered
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                      attrs = prepare_template_attributes(template_params.to_h.symbolize_keys)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                      return if performed? # Early return if error was rendered
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40.
