                      template = list.tasks.new(attrs.merge(creator: current_user))
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                      if template.save
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: serialize_template(template), status: :created
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.error "Template validation failed: #{template.errors.full_messages}"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                          error: {
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                            message: "Validation failed",
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                            details: template.errors.as_json
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                        }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "RecurringTemplatesController#create error: #{e.message}"
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to create recurring template" } },
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/recurring_templates/:id
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                  def update
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                      return not_found unless @template
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                      attrs = prepare_template_attributes(template_params.to_h.symbolize_keys)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                      return if performed? # Early return if error was rendered
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                      if @template.update(attrs)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Propagate only fields that were provided, to FUTURE, INCOMPLETE instances
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                        changed_fields = {}
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                        changed_fields[:title] = @template.title if attrs.key?(:title)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                        changed_fields[:note]  = @template.note  if attrs.key?(:note)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                        if changed_fields.present?
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                          Task.where(recurring_template_id: @template.id)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                              .where("due_at > ?", Time.current)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                              .where.not(status: Task.statuses[:done])
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                              .find_each { |inst| inst.update!(changed_fields) }
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: serialize_template(@template), status: :ok
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.error "Template update validation failed: #{@template.errors.full_messages}"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                          error: {
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                            message: "Validation failed",
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                            details: @template.errors.as_json
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                        }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "RecurringTemplatesController#update error: #{e.message}"
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to update recurring template" } },
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                  # DELETE /api/v1/recurring_templates/:id
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  def destroy
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                      return not_found unless @template
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                      if ActiveModel::Type::Boolean.new.cast(params[:delete_instances])
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                        Task.where(recurring_template_id: @template.id).find_each(&:destroy!)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                      @template.destroy!
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                      head :no_content
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "RecurringTemplatesController#destroy error: #{e.message}"
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to delete recurring template" } },
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/recurring_templates/:id/generate_instance
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  def generate_instance
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                      return not_found unless @template
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                      instance = @template.generate_next_instance
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless instance
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Could not generate instance" } },
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: serialize_instance(instance), status: :created
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "RecurringTemplatesController#generate_instance error: #{e.message}"
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to generate instance" } },
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/recurring_templates/:id/instances
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                  def instances
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                      return not_found unless @template
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                      instances = Task.where(recurring_template_id: @template.id).order(due_at: :desc)   # spec expects ordering by due_at descending
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: instances.map { |i| serialize_instance(i) }, status: :ok
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "RecurringTemplatesController#instances error: #{e.message}"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to retrieve instances" } },
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                  private
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  def build_templates_query
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                    templates = base_scope
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                    templates = templates.where(list_id: params[:list_id]) if params[:list_id].present?
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                    templates
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                  # 🔽 IMPORTANT: specs create lists with lists.user_id, not owner_id
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                  def base_scope
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                    Task
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                      .joins(:list)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                      .where(lists: { user_id: current_user.id })
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                      .where(is_recurring: true, recurring_template_id: nil)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                  def set_template
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                    @template = base_scope.find_by(id: params[:id])
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                  def not_found
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "Recurring template not found" } }, status: :not_found
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  def find_authorized_list(list_id)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                    return nil if list_id.blank?
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                    list = current_user&.owned_lists&.find_by(id: list_id) ||
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                           List.find_by(id: list_id, user_id: current_user.id)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                    unless list
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "List not found" } }, status: :not_found
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                      return nil
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                    list
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  def prepare_template_attributes(attrs)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs[:note] = attrs.delete(:description) if attrs.key?(:description)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs[:is_recurring] = true
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs[:recurring_template_id] = nil
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs[:strict_mode] ||= false
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                    # due_at is required by the model; seed it if missing
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs[:due_at] ||= begin
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                      if attrs[:recurrence_time].present?
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                        t = Time.zone.parse(attrs[:recurrence_time].to_s) rescue nil
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                        if t
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                          (Time.zone.today.to_time + t.seconds_since_midnight)
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                        else
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                          Time.current
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                        Time.current
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                    if attrs.key?(:recurrence_days)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                      days = Array(attrs[:recurrence_days])
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Convert day names to numbers if needed
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                      day_map = { "sunday" => 0, "monday" => 1, "tuesday" => 2, "wednesday" => 3, "thursday" => 4, "friday" => 5, "saturday" => 6 }
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                      attrs[:recurrence_days] = days.map { |day| day_map[day.to_s.downcase] || day.to_i }
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                  def validate_params
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate recurrence_time format if present
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:recurrence_time].present?
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                      time_str = params[:recurrence_time].to_s
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless time_str.match?(/\A([01]?[0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]\z/)
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                          error: {
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                            message: "Validation failed",
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                            details: { recurrence_time: [ "must be in HH:MM format" ] }
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                        }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate recurrence_days if present
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:recurrence_days].present?
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                      days = Array(params[:recurrence_days])
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                      valid_days = (0..6).to_a
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                      day_map = { "sunday" => 0, "monday" => 1, "tuesday" => 2, "wednesday" => 3, "thursday" => 4, "friday" => 5, "saturday" => 6 }
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                      days.each do |day|
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                        day_value = day_map[day.to_s.downcase] || day.to_i
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                        unless valid_days.include?(day_value)
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                          render json: {
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                            error: {
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                              message: "Validation failed",
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                              details: { recurrence_days: [ "must be valid day values (0-6 or day names)" ] }
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

                            }
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                          }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                          return
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate list_id if present
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:list_id].present?
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless params[:list_id].to_s.match?(/\A\d+\z/)
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                          error: {

                            message: "Validation failed",

                  def serialize_template(t, include_instances: false)
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                    payload = {

    297.

      298.

                      note: t.note,

    299. 
            

            
              
            

                      is_recurring: t.is_recurring?,
          
      300.

                      recurrence_pattern: t.recurrence_pattern,
          
      301.

                      recurrence_interval: t.recurrence_interval,
          
      302.

                      created_at: t.created_at,
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            
              
            

                      updated_at: t.updated_at
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            
              
            

                    if include_instances
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            
              
            

                      payload[:instances] = Task.where(recurring_template_id: t.id).order(:due_at).map { |i| serialize_instance(i) }

                  def serialize_instance(i)
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            
              
            

                      id: i.id,
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318.

      324.

      325.

      326.

                  def index

                  def build_locations_query
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                    locations = current_user.saved_locations
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply search filter if present
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:search].present?
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                      search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                      locations = locations.where("name ILIKE ? OR address ILIKE ?", search_term, search_term)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply ordering
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                    order_by = params[:order_by] || "created_at"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                    order_direction = params[:order_direction]&.downcase == "asc" ? "asc" : "desc"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                    case order_by
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "name"
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                      locations = locations.order("name #{order_direction}")
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                    when "updated_at"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                      locations = locations.order("updated_at #{order_direction}")
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                      locations = locations.order("created_at #{order_direction}")
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                    locations
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  def set_location
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                      @location = current_user.saved_locations.find(params[:id])
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound => e
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.warn "Saved location not found: #{params[:id]}"
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Resource not found" } },
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :not_found
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Error finding saved location: #{e.message}"
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to retrieve saved location" } },
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                  def validate_location_params
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate latitude if present
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:saved_location] && params[:saved_location][:latitude].present?
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                      latitude = params[:saved_location][:latitude].to_f
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless latitude.between?(-90, 90)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                          error: {
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                            message: "Validation failed",
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                            details: { latitude: [ "must be between -90 and 90" ] }
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                        }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate longitude if present
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:saved_location] && params[:saved_location][:longitude].present?
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                      longitude = params[:saved_location][:longitude].to_f
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless longitude.between?(-180, 180)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                          error: {
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                            message: "Validation failed",
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                            details: { longitude: [ "must be between -180 and 180" ] }
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                        }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate radius_meters if present
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:saved_location] && params[:saved_location][:radius_meters].present?
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                      radius = params[:saved_location][:radius_meters].to_f
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless radius > 0 && radius <= 10000
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                          error: {
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                            message: "Validation failed",
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                            details: { radius_meters: [ "must be between 1 and 10000 meters" ] }
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                        }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate name length if present
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:saved_location] && params[:saved_location][:name].present?
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                      name = params[:saved_location][:name].to_s.strip
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                      if name.length > 255
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                          error: {
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                            message: "Validation failed",
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                            details: { name: [ "is too long (maximum 255 characters)" ] }
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                        }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate address length if present
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:saved_location] && params[:saved_location][:address].present?
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                      address = params[:saved_location][:address].to_s.strip
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                      if address.length > 500
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                          error: {
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                            message: "Validation failed",
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                            details: { address: [ "is too long (maximum 500 characters)" ] }
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                        }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                        nil
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                  def location_params
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                    params.require(:saved_location).permit(:name, :latitude, :longitude, :radius_meters, :address)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      206.

                  # GET /api/v1/lists/:list_id/tasks
          
      13.

                  def index
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                      tasks = build_tasks_query(@list.tasks.where(parent_task_id: nil).not_deleted)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Apply pagination
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                      page = [ params[:page].to_i, 1 ].max
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                      per_page = per_page_limit
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                      offset = (page - 1) * per_page
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                      paginated_tasks = tasks.limit(per_page).offset(offset)

      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                        tombstones: [],

    27. 
            

            
              
            

                        pagination: {
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                          page: page,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29.

      30.

                          total: tasks.count,

      32.

      33.

      34.

                  # GET /api/v1/tasks - Get all tasks across all lists for current user

                  end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/lists/:list_id/tasks/:id
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  def show
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user, include_subtasks: true).as_json
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "TasksController#show error: #{e.message}"
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to retrieve task" } },
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/lists/:list_id/tasks
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  def create
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Handle empty request body
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                      if request.content_type&.include?("application/json") && request.raw_post.to_s.strip.empty?
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                        return render json: { error: { message: "Bad Request" } }, status: :bad_request
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Debug logging for iOS app issues
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.info "Task creation request - Raw params: #{params.inspect}"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.info "Task creation request - Parsed task_params: #{task_params.inspect}"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                      unless @list.can_add_items_by?(current_user)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Try to find a list the user can add items to
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                        fallback_list = current_user.owned_lists.first
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                        if fallback_list && fallback_list.can_add_items_by?(current_user)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                          @list = fallback_list
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                          Rails.logger.info "Redirected task creation from list #{params[:list_id]} to list #{@list.id} for user #{current_user.id}"
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                        else
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                          return render json: { error: { message: "You do not have permission to add tasks to this list" } },
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                                 status: :forbidden
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                      @task = TaskCreationService.new(@list, current_user, task_params).call
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :created
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => e
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Task creation validation failed: #{e.record.errors.full_messages}"
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: {
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                        error: "Validation failed",
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                        details: e.record.errors.to_hash
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                      }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Task creation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Task params: #{task_params.inspect}"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to create task" } },
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/lists/:list_id/tasks/:id
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                  def update
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                      if @task.update(task_params)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.error "Task update validation failed: #{@task.errors.full_messages}"
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                          error: {
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                            message: "Validation failed",
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                            details: @task.errors.as_json
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                        }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140.
