      565. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    565. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      566. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    566. 
            

            
              
            

                  def task_params
          
      567. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    567. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Handle both nested task params and direct params (iOS app)
          
      568. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    568. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:task].present?
          
      569. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    569. 
            

            
              
            

                      params.require(:task).permit(
          
      570. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    570. 
            

            
              
            

                        :title, :note, :due_at, :priority, :can_be_snoozed, :strict_mode,
          
      571. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    571. 
            

            
              
            

                        :notification_interval_minutes, :requires_explanation_if_missed,
          
      572. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    572. 
            

            
              
            

                        :is_recurring, :recurrence_pattern, :recurrence_interval, :recurrence_time, :recurrence_end_date,
          
      573. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    573. 
            

            
              
            

                        :location_based, :location_latitude, :location_longitude, :location_radius_meters,
          
      574. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    574. 
            

            
              
            

                        :location_name, :notify_on_arrival, :notify_on_departure,
          
      575. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    575. 
            

            
              
            

                        :list_id, :creator_id, :visibility,
          
      576. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    576. 
            

            
              
            

                        { recurrence_days: [] }
          
      577. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    577. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      578. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    578. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      579. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    579. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Handle direct params from iOS app - be more permissive to handle parameter pollution
          
      580. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    580. 
            

            
              
            

                      begin
          
      581. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    581. 
            

            
              
            

                        params.permit(
          
      582. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    582. 
            

            
              
            

                          :title, :note, :due_at, :priority, :can_be_snoozed, :strict_mode,
          
      583. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    583. 
            

            
              
            

                          :notification_interval_minutes, :requires_explanation_if_missed,
          
      584. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    584. 
            

            
              
            

                          :is_recurring, :recurrence_pattern, :recurrence_interval, :recurrence_time, :recurrence_end_date,
          
      585. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    585. 
            

            
              
            

                          :location_based, :location_latitude, :location_longitude, :location_radius_meters,
          
      586. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    586. 
            

            
              
            

                          :location_name, :notify_on_arrival, :notify_on_departure,
          
      587. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    587. 
            

            
              
            

                          :list_id, :creator_id, :name, :dueDate, :description, :due_date, :visibility,
          
      588. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    588. 
            

            
              
            

                          { recurrence_days: [] }
          
      589. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    589. 
            

            
              
            

                        )
          
      590. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    590. 
            

            
              
            

                      rescue ActionController::UnpermittedParameters => e
          
      591. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    591. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Log but don't fail - this handles parameter pollution gracefully
          
      592. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    592. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.warn "Unpermitted parameters detected: #{e.params.join(', ')}"
          
      593. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    593. 
            

            
              
            

                        params.permit(
          
      594. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    594. 
            

            
              
            

                          :title, :note, :due_at, :priority, :can_be_snoozed, :strict_mode,
          
      595. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    595. 
            

            
              
            

                          :notification_interval_minutes, :requires_explanation_if_missed,
          
      596. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    596. 
            

            
              
            

                          :is_recurring, :recurrence_pattern, :recurrence_interval, :recurrence_time, :recurrence_end_date,
          
      597. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    597. 
            

            
              
            

                          :location_based, :location_latitude, :location_longitude, :location_radius_meters,
          
      598. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    598. 
            

            
              
            

                          :location_name, :notify_on_arrival, :notify_on_departure,
          
      599. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    599. 
            

            
              
            

                          :list_id, :creator_id, :name, :dueDate, :description, :due_date, :visibility,
          
      600. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    600. 
            

            
              
            

                          { recurrence_days: [] }
          
      601. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    601. 
            

            
              
            

                        )
          
      602. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    602. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      603. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    603. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      604. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    604. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      605. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    605. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      606. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    606. 
            

            
              
            

                  def can_access_task?(task)
          
      607. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    607. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Check if user owns the list
          
      608. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    608. 
            

            
              
            

                    return true if task.list.user_id == current_user.id
          
      609. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    609. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      610. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    610. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Check if user created the task
          
      611. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    611. 
            

            
              
            

                    return true if task.creator_id == current_user.id
          
      612. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    612. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      613. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    613. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Check if user is a member/coach of the list
          
      614. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    614. 
            

            
              
            

                    return true if task.list.memberships.exists?(user_id: current_user.id)
          
      615. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    615. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      616. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    616. 
            

            
              
            

                    false
          
      617. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    617. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      618. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    618. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      619. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    619. 
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_task_visibility_change
          
      620. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    620. 
            

            
              
            

                    unless @task.can_change_visibility?(current_user)
          
      621. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    621. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "You do not have permission to change task visibility" } },
          
      622. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    622. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :forbidden
          
      623. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    623. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      624. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    624. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      625. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    625. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      626. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    626. 
            

            
              
            

                  def parse_iso(date_string)
          
      627. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    627. 
            

            
              
            

                    return nil if date_string.blank?
          
      628. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    628. 
            

            
              
            

                    Time.parse(date_string)
          
      629. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    629. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue ArgumentError
          
      630. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    630. 
            

            
              
            

                    nil
          
      631. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    631.

                  def build_tasks_query(base_query)
          
      656. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    656. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply status filtering
          
      657. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    657. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:status].present?
          
      658. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    658. 
            

            
              
            

                      case params[:status]
          
      659. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    659. 
            

            
              
            

                      when "pending"
          
      660. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    660. 
            

            
              
            

                        base_query = base_query.where(status: "pending")
          
      661. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    661. 
            

            
              
            

                      when "completed", "done"
          
      662. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    662. 
            

            
              
            

                        base_query = base_query.where(status: "done")
          
      663. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    663. 
            

            
              
            

                      when "overdue"
          
      664. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    664. 
            

            
              
            

                        base_query = base_query.where("due_at < ?", Time.current).where.not(status: "done")
          
      665. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    665. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      666. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    666. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      667. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    667. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      668. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    668. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply list filtering for all_tasks
          
      669. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    669. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:list_id].present?
          
      670. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    670. 
            

            
              
            

                      base_query = base_query.where(list_id: params[:list_id])
          
      671. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    671. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      672. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    672. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      673. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    673. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply sorting
          
      674. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    674. 
            

            
              
            

                    sort_by = params[:sort_by] || "created_at"
          
      675. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    675. 
            

            
              
            

                    sort_order = params[:sort_order] || "desc"
          
      676. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    676. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      677. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    677. 
            

            
              
            

                    if %w[created_at updated_at due_at title].include?(sort_by) && %w[asc desc].include?(sort_order)
          
      678. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    678. 
            

            
              
            

                      base_query = base_query.order("#{sort_by} #{sort_order}")
          
      679. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    679. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      680. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    680. 
            

            
              
            

                      base_query = base_query.order(created_at: :desc)
          
      681. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    681. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      682. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    682. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      683. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    683. 
            

            
              
            

                    base_query
          
      684. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    684. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      685. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    685. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      686. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    686. 
            

            
              
            

                  def per_page_limit
          
      687. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    687. 
            

            
              
            

                    [ params[:per_page].to_i, 1 ].max.clamp(1, 100)
          
      688. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    688. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      689. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    689. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      690. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    690. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      691. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    691. 
            

            
              
            

            end

              def sanitize_nested_params(params_hash)

              # Helper method to ensure consistent error response structure
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def build_error_response(message, status, details = nil)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                response = {
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                  error: {
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: message,
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                    status: Rack::Utils.status_code(status),
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                    timestamp: Time.current.iso8601
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                response[:error][:details] = details if details.present?
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                response
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260.

      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      262.

              # Helper method to validate error details
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def validate_error_details(details)
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return nil if details.nil?
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265.

                case details
          
      267.

                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when Hash, Array, String, Numeric, TrueClass, FalseClass, NilClass

                  details

                when ActiveModel::Errors

    270. 
            

            
              
            

                  details.as_json
          
      271.

                  else: 0

            class HealthController < ApplicationController

              skip_before_action :authenticate_user!

      6.

              def live

    7. 
            

            
              
            

                head :ok

      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9.

    10. 
            

            
              
            

              def ready
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                checks = {
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  db: database_healthy?,
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  redis: redis_healthy?,
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  queue: queue_healthy?
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                if checks.values.all?
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { status: "ok", checks: checks }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { status: "degraded", checks: checks }, status: :service_unavailable
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24.

              private
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

              def database_healthy?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                ActiveRecord::Base.connection.active?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Database health check failed: #{e.message}"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                false
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

              def redis_healthy?
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                Redis.new.ping == "PONG"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Redis health check failed: #{e.message}"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                false
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

              def queue_healthy?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                Sidekiq.redis_info.present?
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Queue health check failed: #{e.message}"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                false
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

              end

    46. 
            

            
              
            

            end

    app/helpers/configuration_helper.rb

              def self.config

                @config ||= begin

              def self.get(key_path, default = nil)

      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  return default unless value.is_a?(Hash)

    23.

              def self.parse_time_period(period_string)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                case period_string.downcase.strip
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*minutes?$/
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.minutes
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*hours?$/
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.hours
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*days?$/

    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.days
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*weeks?$/

    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.weeks
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*months?$/

                  $1.to_i.months
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108.

                when /^(\d+)\s*years?$/

    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.years
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  # Fallback to default if parsing fails
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  1.week
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113.

    app/jobs/application_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    7 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 7 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked, wait: :exponentially_longer, attempts: 3
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # Most jobs are safe to ignore if the underlying records are no longer available
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              # Retry on network errors with exponential backoff
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              retry_on StandardError, wait: :exponentially_longer, attempts: 3 do |job, error|
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Job #{job.class.name} failed: #{error.message}"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      13.

    app/jobs/notification_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    59 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 59 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class NotificationJob < ApplicationJob
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              queue_as :push
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform(method, *args)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                # Support different notification types
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                case method
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                when /^coaching_/
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  handle_coaching_notification(method, *args)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                when /^task_/, /^new_item_/, /^explanation_/, /^send_reminder/, /^app_blocking_/, /^alert_coaches_/, /^location_based_/, /^recurring_task_/
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  handle_task_notification(method, *args)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                when /^list_/
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  handle_list_notification(method, *args)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                when /^send_daily_summary/
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  handle_summary_notification(method, *args)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                when /^send_test_notification/
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  handle_test_notification(method, *args)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Unknown notification method: #{method}"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "NotificationJob failed for #{method}: #{e.message}"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                raise e # Re-raise to trigger retry
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

              def handle_coaching_notification(method, rel_id)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                rel = CoachingRelationship.find(rel_id)
          
      31.

                NotificationService.public_send(method, rel)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound => e
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33.

      34.

                # Don't re-raise - this is expected if relationship was deleted
          
      35.

      36.

              def handle_list_notification(method, list_id, *extra_args)

    45. 
            

            
              
            

                list = List.find(list_id)

                # For list_shared, convert coach_id to User object

                if method == "list_shared" && extra_args.first.is_a?(Integer)
          
      48.

                  coach = User.find(coach_id)
          
      50.

      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52.

      53.

            class NudgeJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Job
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform(task_id, reason = nil)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                task = Task.find(task_id)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                list = task.list
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                members = list.memberships.includes(:user).map(&:user)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                members.each do |user|
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.devices.find_each do |device|
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                    ApnsClient.new.push(
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                      device_token: device.apns_token,
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: "Task updated",
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                      body:  push_body(task, reason),
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                      payload: { type: "task.nudge", task_id: task.id }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

              def push_body(task, reason)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                if task.done?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Completed: #{task.title}"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif reason.present?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Reassigned: #{task.title} — #{reason}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Due soon: #{task.title}"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            end

            class CoachingRelationship < ApplicationRecord

              belongs_to :coach, class_name: "User"

              belongs_to :client, class_name: "User"

              has_many :memberships, dependent: :destroy

            class DailySummary < ApplicationRecord
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              belongs_to :coaching_relationship
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              # Treat JSON column as a Hash by default
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              attribute :summary_data, :json, default: {}
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9.

              # Soft delete: exclude deleted rows by default

    10. 
            

            
              
            

              default_scope { where(deleted_at: nil) }
          
      11.

    12. 
            

            
              
            

              # Validations
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :summary_date, presence: true
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :summary_date, uniqueness: { scope: :coaching_relationship_id }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :tasks_completed, :tasks_missed, :tasks_overdue, presence: true
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :tasks_completed, :tasks_missed, :tasks_overdue,
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                        numericality: { only_integer: true, greater_than_or_equal_to: 0 }
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

              validate :summary_data_must_be_object
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

              validate :summary_date_cannot_be_in_future
          
      20.

              validate :coaching_relationship_must_be_active
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21.

              # Callbacks
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

              before_validation :apply_defaults
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

              # Scopes
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

              scope :sent, -> { where(sent: true) }
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

              scope :unsent, -> { where(sent: false) }
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

              scope :for_date, ->(date) { where(summary_date: date.to_date) }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

              scope :for_coaching_relationship, ->(rel) { where(coaching_relationship_id: rel.is_a?(CoachingRelationship) ? rel.id : rel) }
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

              scope :recent, -> { where("summary_date > ?", 7.days.ago.to_date).order(summary_date: :desc) }
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              scope :with_tasks, -> { where("tasks_completed > 0 OR tasks_missed > 0 OR tasks_overdue > 0") }
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32.

                def statistics_for_coaching_relationship(rel)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  rel_id = rel.is_a?(CoachingRelationship) ? rel.id : rel
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                  rows = unscoped.where(coaching_relationship_id: rel_id, deleted_at: nil)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                  totals_completed = rows.sum(:tasks_completed)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                  totals_missed    = rows.sum(:tasks_missed)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                  totals_overdue   = rows.sum(:tasks_overdue)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  average_rate     = begin
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                    total_tasks = totals_completed + totals_missed
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                    total_tasks.zero? ? 0.0 : ((totals_completed.to_f / total_tasks) * 100).round(2)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                    total_summaries: rows.count,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                    total_tasks_completed: totals_completed,
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                    total_tasks_missed: totals_missed,
          
      78.

    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  active: active
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

              # "Online" within the last 5 minutes
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

              ONLINE_WINDOW = 5.minutes
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

              def online?
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                return false unless last_seen_at.present?
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                last_seen_at > ONLINE_WINDOW.ago
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

              def age
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                return 0 unless created_at
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                (Time.current - created_at).to_f
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

              def status
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                return "offline" unless active
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                online? ? "online" : "idle"
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

              # ----------------------------

              # Class helpers
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

              # ----------------------------
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

              def self.find_by_token(token)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                with_deleted.where(apns_token: token).or(with_deleted.where(fcm_token: token)).first
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      138.

              private

              def normalize_fields
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                self.platform   = platform.to_s.downcase.strip if platform.present?
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                self.apns_token = apns_token.to_s              if apns_token.present?
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                self.fcm_token  = fcm_token.to_s.strip         if fcm_token.present?
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                self.bundle_id  = bundle_id.to_s               if bundle_id.present?
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

              def seed_last_seen_at
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                self.last_seen_at ||= Time.current
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

              # Ensure last_seen_at bumps on regular updates
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

              def bump_last_seen_at_on_update
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                self.last_seen_at = Time.current
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

              # Ensure last_seen_at bumps when #touch is called
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

              def bump_last_seen_at_on_touch
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                update_column(:last_seen_at, Time.current)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163.

              private
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

              def reject_known_invalid_tokens
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                if apns_token.present? && apns_token.to_s.downcase.include?("invalid")
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  errors.add(:apns_token, "is invalid")
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                if fcm_token.present? && fcm_token.to_s.downcase.include?("invalid")
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  errors.add(:fcm_token, "is invalid")
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

            end
