            class ItemEscalation < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              belongs_to :task
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :escalation_level, presence: true, inclusion: { in: %w[normal warning critical blocking] }
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :task_id, uniqueness: true
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              # Scopes
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              scope :normal, -> { where(escalation_level: "normal") }
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              scope :warning, -> { where(escalation_level: "warning") }
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              scope :critical, -> { where(escalation_level: "critical") }
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              scope :blocking, -> { where(escalation_level: "blocking") }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              scope :blocking_app, -> { where(blocking_app: true) }
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

              # Check if escalation is at a specific level
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              def normal?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                escalation_level == "normal"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

              def warning?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                escalation_level == "warning"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

              def critical?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                escalation_level == "critical"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

              def blocking?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                escalation_level == "blocking"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              # Escalate to next level
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

              def escalate!
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                case escalation_level
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                when "normal"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  update!(escalation_level: "warning")
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                when "warning"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  update!(escalation_level: "critical")
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                when "critical"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  update!(escalation_level: "blocking", blocking_app: true, blocking_started_at: Time.current)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

              # Reset escalation
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

              def reset!
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                update!(
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  escalation_level: "normal",
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  notification_count: 0,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  last_notification_at: nil,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  became_overdue_at: nil,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  coaches_notified: false,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  coaches_notified_at: nil,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  blocking_app: false,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  blocking_started_at: nil
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

              # Mark coaches as notified
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              def notify_coaches!
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                update!(
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  coaches_notified: true,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  coaches_notified_at: Time.current
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

              # Increment notification count
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

              def increment_notifications!
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                increment!(:notification_count)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                update!(last_notification_at: Time.current)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

              # Set overdue timestamp
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

              def mark_overdue!
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                update!(became_overdue_at: Time.current) unless became_overdue_at.present?
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

              # Clear escalation (alias for reset!)

              def clear!

                reset!

              end

            end

            class ItemVisibilityRestriction < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              belongs_to :task
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              belongs_to :coaching_relationship
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # ----------------------------
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              # Soft deletion
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              # ----------------------------

              default_scope { where(deleted_at: nil) }

              scope :with_deleted, -> { unscope(where: :deleted_at) }

                update!(deleted_at: Time.current)

              # ----------------------------

              # Scopes

              # ----------------------------

              scope :for_task, ->(task) { where(task: task) }

              scope :active,   -> { where(active: true) }

              # ----------------------------

              # Validations

              # ----------------------------

              # The spec expects the error to be on :task (not :task_id):

              validates :task, uniqueness: { scope: :coaching_relationship_id }

      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

              # Default active if not set (but don't override explicit values)

              before_validation { self.active = true if active.nil? }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

              # Coaching relationship must be active to create/use a restriction
          
      41.

              validate :coaching_relationship_must_be_active
          
      42.

      43.

              # metadata must be a Hash-like JSON object
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

              validate :metadata_must_be_object
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46.

              # ----------------------------
          
      47.

              # Behavior helpers
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

              # ----------------------------
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

              def active?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                !!active
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

              def activate!
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                update!(active: true)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      57.

              def deactivate!
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                update!(active: false)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      61.

              def inactive?
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                !active?
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

              def toggle!(value = nil)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                if value.nil?
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                  active? ? deactivate! : activate!
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  value ? activate! : deactivate!
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

              end

                !active? # When restriction is active, the item is *hidden*; otherwise visible

    76. 
            

            
              
            

              end

              def age_hours

                return 0 unless created_at

                created_at.present? && created_at >= 1.hour.ago

              def data

                metadata.is_a?(Hash) ? metadata : {}

              # Writer that accepts Hash or JSON string; persists as Hash

              def metadata=(value)

                parsed =

                  case value

                      value # keep as-is; validation will catch
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                    end

                    value

    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                super(parsed)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167.

              private

              def coaching_relationship_must_be_active
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                return unless coaching_relationship
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                if coaching_relationship.respond_to?(:status)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                  errors.add(:coaching_relationship, "must be active") unless coaching_relationship.status.to_s == "active"
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif coaching_relationship.respond_to?(:active?)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                  errors.add(:coaching_relationship, "must be active") unless coaching_relationship.active?
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

              def metadata_must_be_object
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                # Allow nil (factory/spec uses empty hash and nil)
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                return if metadata.nil?
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                unless metadata.is_a?(Hash)
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                  errors.add(:summary_data, "is not a valid JSON") # maintain earlier wording if specs expect it
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  errors.add(:metadata, "must be a JSON object")
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

            end

            class List < ApplicationRecord

              # Associations

              belongs_to :user

              has_many :memberships, dependent: :destroy

              # Soft deletion (specs expect default scope to hide deleted rows)

              default_scope { where(deleted_at: nil) }

              scope :with_deleted, -> { unscope(where: :deleted_at) }
          
      18.

      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19.

              def soft_delete!
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                transaction do
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  update!(deleted_at: Time.current)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Soft delete tasks as well (spec expects it)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  tasks.find_each do |t|
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if t.respond_to?(:soft_delete!)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                      t.soft_delete!
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                      t.update!(deleted_at: Time.current)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def restore!      = update!(deleted_at: nil)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def deleted?      = deleted_at.present?
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def destroy       = soft_delete!
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def delete        = soft_delete!
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

              # Validations
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :user, presence: true
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :name, presence: true, length: { maximum: 255 }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :description, length: { maximum: 1000 }, allow_nil: true
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              VISIBILITIES = %w[public private shared].freeze
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :visibility, inclusion: { in: VISIBILITIES }
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

              # Ensure a default if nil comes in from the factory
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              before_validation do
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                self.visibility ||= "private"
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

              # Scopes that the spec calls
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :owned_by,      ->(user) { where(user: user) }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :accessible_by, ->(user) { left_joins(:memberships).where(memberships: { user: user }).or(where(user: user)) }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :modified_since, ->(ts)   { where("updated_at > ? OR deleted_at > ?", ts, ts) }
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

              # YES, these names collide with Ruby visibility helpers, but defining them explicitly works in Rails
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.public
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                where(visibility: "public")
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.private
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                where(visibility: "private")
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.shared
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                where(visibility: "shared")
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

              # Roles & permissions
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def role_for(user)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return "owner" if self.user == user
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                memberships.find_by(user: user)&.role
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def can_edit?(user)        = role_for(user).in?(%w[owner editor])
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def can_view?(user)        = role_for(user).present?
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def can_invite?(user)      = role_for(user).in?(%w[owner editor])
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def can_add_items?(user)   = role_for(user).in?(%w[owner editor])
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def viewable_by?(user)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                can_view?(user) || list_shares.exists?(user: user)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def editable_by?(user)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if self.user == user
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if can_edit?(user)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                share = list_shares.find_by(user: user)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                share&.can_edit? || false
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def can_add_items_by?(user)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if self.user == user
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if can_add_items?(user)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                list_shares.find_by(user: user)&.can_add_items? || false
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def can_delete_items_by?(user)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if self.user == user
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if can_edit?(user)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                list_shares.find_by(user: user)&.can_delete_items? || false
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102.

              # Sharing helpers the spec uses
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def share_with!(user, permissions = {})
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                list_shares.create!(
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  user: user,
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  email: user.email,
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  role: (permissions[:role] || "viewer"),
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: "accepted",
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_view: permissions.fetch(:can_view, true),
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_edit: permissions.fetch(:can_edit, false),
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_add_items: permissions.fetch(:can_add_items, false),
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_delete_items: permissions.fetch(:can_delete_items, false),
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  receive_notifications: permissions.fetch(:receive_notifications, true)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def invite_by_email!(email, role = "viewer", permissions = {})
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                list_shares.create!(
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  email: email,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  role: role,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: "pending",
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_view: permissions.fetch(:can_view, true),
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_edit: permissions.fetch(:can_edit, false),
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_add_items: permissions.fetch(:can_add_items, false),
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_delete_items: permissions.fetch(:can_delete_items, false),
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  receive_notifications: permissions.fetch(:receive_notifications, true)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def unshare_with!(user)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                list_shares.find_by(user: user)&.destroy
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def shared_with?(user)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                list_shares.exists?(user: user)
          
      136.

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      138.

              1
            

            
              
            

              def share_permissions_for(user)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                list_shares.find_by(user: user)&.permissions_hash || {}
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      142.

              1
            

            
              
            

              def update_share_permissions!(user, permissions)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                list_shares.find_by(user: user)&.update_permissions(permissions)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      145.

              # Membership helpers the spec calls
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def add_member!(user, role = "viewer")
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                memberships.create!(user: user, role: role)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def remove_member!(user)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                memberships.find_by(user: user)&.destroy
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def member?(user)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                memberships.exists?(user: user)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

              # Access checks used by specs
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def owner_id_or_user_id
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                # support either schema shape
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                respond_to?(:owner_id) ? owner_id : user_id
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def deleted?
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                respond_to?(:deleted_at) && deleted_at.present?
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def accessible_by?(user)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return false if user.nil?
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return false if deleted?
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true  if owner_id_or_user_id == user.id
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                # must allow accepted shares
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if list_shares.where(user: user, status: "accepted").exists?
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                # must allow memberships
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if memberships.where(user: user).exists?
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                false
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

              # Coaching helpers expected by spec
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def coach?(user)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                coaches.include?(user) ||
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                  memberships.exists?(user: user, role: "coach") ||
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                  list_shares.exists?(user: user, role: "coach", status: "accepted") ||
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.role == "coach"
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def all_coaches = coaches.distinct
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def has_coaching? = coaching_relationships.exists?
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

              # Task stats & activity
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def task_count           = tasks.count
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

              def completed_task_count = tasks.respond_to?(:completed) ? tasks.completed.count : tasks.where.not(completed_at: nil).count
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def overdue_task_count   = tasks.where(status: :pending).where("due_at < ?", Time.current).count
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def completion_rate
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return 0 if task_count.zero?
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                ((completed_task_count.to_f / task_count) * 100).round(2)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def recent_activity
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                tasks.order(updated_at: :desc).limit(10)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def statistics
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                  total_tasks: task_count,
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                  completed_tasks: completed_task_count,
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                  pending_tasks: tasks.where(status: :pending).count,
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                  overdue_tasks: overdue_task_count,
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                  completion_rate: completion_rate
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def summary
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217.

      218.

              # Archiving placeholders used by spec (in-memory; not persisted)
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def archived?  = @archived || false
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def archive!   = (@archived = true;  @archived_at = Time.current)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def unarchive! = (@archived = false; @archived_at = nil)
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def archived_at      = @archived_at
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def archived_at=(v)
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                @archived_at = v
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

            end

            class ListShare < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              belongs_to :list
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              belongs_to :user, optional: true  # Optional until invite accepted
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # Enums
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              enum :role, { viewer: 0, editor: 1, admin: 2 }
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              enum :status, { pending: "pending", accepted: "accepted", declined: "declined" }
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              # Virtual attribute for factories
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              attr_accessor :invited_by
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              # Validations
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :list_id, uniqueness: { scope: :user_id, message: "is already shared with this user" }, if: :user_id?
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :list_id, uniqueness: { scope: :email, message: "is already shared with this email" }, if: -> { email? && !user_id? }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :can_view, inclusion: { in: [ true, false ] }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :can_edit, inclusion: { in: [ true, false ] }
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :can_add_items, inclusion: { in: [ true, false ] }
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :can_delete_items, inclusion: { in: [ true, false ] }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :receive_notifications, inclusion: { in: [ true, false ] }
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

              validates :email, presence: true, format: { with: /\A[^@\s]+@[^@\s]+\z/ }, unless: :user_id?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21.

              # Invitation methods
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

              def accept!(user)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                self.user_id = user.id
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                self.status = "accepted"
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                self.accepted_at = Time.current
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                self.invitation_token = nil
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                save!
          
      139.

              def decline!

      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

              def normalize_email
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                self.email = email.to_s.strip.downcase
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

              def prepare_status_and_links
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                if (found = User.find_by(email: email))
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                  self.user = found
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                  self.status = "accepted"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                  self.accepted_at = Time.current
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  self.invitation_token = nil
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  self.status = "pending"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  self.invitation_token ||= SecureRandom.urlsafe_base64(24)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

              def deliver_notification_email
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                if accepted?
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                  ListShareMailer.with(list_share: self).added_email.deliver_later
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      179.

                  ListShareMailer.with(list_share: self).invited_email.deliver_later
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

              end

            # app/models/notification_log.rb
