              1
            

            
              
            

              def reassign!(user, new_due_at:, reason:)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return false if strict_mode && reason.blank?
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return false if new_due_at.blank?
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return false unless can_be_reassigned_by?(user)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                update!(due_at: new_due_at)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                create_task_event(kind: :reassigned, reason: reason, user: user, occurred_at: Time.current)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                true
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def overdue?
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                pending? && due_at.present? && due_at < Time.current
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def minutes_overdue
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return 0 unless overdue?
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                ((Time.current - due_at) / 60).round
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def created_by_coach?
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                creator&.coach?
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def editable_by?(user)    = user.present? && list.can_edit?(user)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def deletable_by?(user)   = user.present? && list.can_edit?(user)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def completable_by?(user) = user.present? && !done? && !deleted? && list.can_edit?(user)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def subtask_completion_percentage
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return 0 if subtasks.empty?
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                ((subtasks.where(status: :done).count.to_f / subtasks.count) * 100).round(1)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def should_block_app?
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return false unless overdue?
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return false if can_be_snoozed?
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                minutes_overdue > 120
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def create_escalation!
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return escalation if escalation.present?
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                ItemEscalation.create!(
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  task: self,
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                  escalation_level: "normal",
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                  notification_count: 0,
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                  became_overdue_at: Time.current
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def all_subtasks_completed?
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if subtasks.empty?
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                subtasks.all?(&:done?)
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def done?        = status == "done"
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def completed?   = done?
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def in_progress? = status == "in_progress"
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def snoozable?   = !!self[:can_be_snoozed]
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def requires_explanation? = !!self[:requires_explanation_if_missed]
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def location_based?       = !!self[:location_based]
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def is_recurring?         = !!self[:is_recurring]
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def recurring?            = is_recurring?
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

              # Accept virtual :is_template on build/create (used by specs/factories)
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def is_template=(value)
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                @is_template_flag = ActiveModel::Type::Boolean.new.cast(value)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                self[:is_template] = @is_template_flag
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def is_template
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                @is_template_flag || self[:is_template]
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def is_template?
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                # Consider a task a template if either:
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                # - it was flagged via the virtual setter, OR
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                # - it's recurring and not an instance (no recurring_template_id)
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                (@is_template_flag == true) || (is_recurring? && recurring_template_id.nil?) || (self[:is_template] == true)
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              alias_method :template?, :is_template?
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def is_instance?
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                recurring_template_id.present? || (self[:is_template] == false)
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              alias_method :instance?, :is_instance?
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def age_hours
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return 0.0 unless created_at
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                (Time.current - created_at) / 3600.0
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def recent?
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                created_at && created_at >= 1.hour.ago
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def priority
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return "medium" unless due_at
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                due_at <= 2.hours.from_now ? "high" : "medium"
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def coordinates
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return nil unless location_based?
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

                [ location_latitude, location_longitude ]
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def distance_to_user(user)
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return Float::INFINITY unless user&.latitude && user&.longitude && location_latitude && location_longitude
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                calculate_distance(location_latitude, location_longitude, user.latitude, user.longitude)
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265.

              def user_at_location?(user_latitude, user_longitude)
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0

      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0

      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

                calculate_distance(location_latitude, location_longitude, user_latitude, user_longitude) <= location_radius_meters.to_i
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      271.

              def user_within_geofence?(user)

                  else: 0

      274.

      275.

              def visible_to?(user)
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return false unless user
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return false if list.deleted?
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                if deleted?
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

                  return (creator == user || list.user == user)
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

                case visibility
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

                when "visible_to_all"
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  # visible_to_all tasks are visible to everyone, regardless of list access
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

                  true
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

                when "private_task"
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  # Private tasks require list access and ownership
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

                  list.accessible_by?(user) && (creator == user || list.user == user)
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            
              
            

                when "hidden_from_coaches"
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  # Hidden from coaches requires list access and ownership
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                  list.accessible_by?(user) && (creator == user || list.user == user)
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                when "coaching_only"
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  # Coaching only requires list access and either ownership or coach role
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

                  list.accessible_by?(user) && (creator == user || list.user == user || user.coach?)
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  # For other visibility levels, check if user has access to the list
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

                  list.accessible_by?(user)
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
            

              end

              def create_task_event(kind: nil, reason: nil, user: nil, occurred_at: nil, metadata: nil)

    373. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                task_events.create!(
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  user:        user || list&.user || self.creator, # whichever makes sense in your app

      376.

      379.

              def recurrence_interval_not_blank

      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if it's a valid time format (HH:MM)

                  else: 0

    393.

              def prevent_circular_subtask_relationship

      423.

                  errors.add(:parent_task, "cannot be self")

              def calculate_daily_recurrence
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            

            
              
            

                base_time = recurrence_time || (due_at || Time.current)
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            

            
              
            

                day_anchor = (due_at || Time.current).beginning_of_day
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            

            
              
            

                next_time  = day_anchor + base_time.seconds_since_midnight
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                next_time += 1.day if next_time <= Time.current
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            

            
              
            

                next_time
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464.

              def calculate_weekly_recurrence
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return nil unless recurrence_days.present?
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            

            
              
            

                base_time = recurrence_time || (due_at || Time.current)
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            

            
              
            

                days      = recurrence_days.map(&:to_i).sort
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            

            
              
            

                now       = Time.current
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            

            
              
            

                days.each do |wday|
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            

            
              
            

                  candidate = now.beginning_of_week + wday.days
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            

            
              
            

                  candidate = candidate.change(hour: base_time.hour, min: base_time.min, sec: base_time.sec)
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  return candidate if candidate > now
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            

            
              
            

                # next week
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            

            
              
            

                first = days.first
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            

            
              
            

                (now.beginning_of_week + 1.week + first.days).change(
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            

            
              
            

                  hour: base_time.hour, min: base_time.min, sec: base_time.sec

              def calculate_monthly_recurrence
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            

            
              
            

                base_time = recurrence_time || (due_at || Time.current)
          
      485. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    485. 
            

            
              
            

                now       = Time.current
          
      486. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    486. 
            

            
              
            

                candidate = now.change(day: (due_at || now).day, hour: base_time.hour, min: base_time.min, sec: base_time.sec) rescue nil
          
      487. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    487. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                candidate = (now.beginning_of_month + base_time.seconds_since_midnight) unless candidate

    488. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0

              def calculate_yearly_recurrence

    494. 
            

            
              
            

                now       = Time.current
          
      495. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    495. 
            

            
              
            

                candidate = now.change(month: (due_at || now).month, day: (due_at || now).day,
          
      496. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    496. 
            

            
              
            

                                       hour: base_time.hour, min: base_time.min, sec: base_time.sec) rescue nil
          
      497. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    497. 
            

            
              
            

                candidate ||= now.beginning_of_year + base_time.seconds_since_midnight
          
      498. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    498. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                candidate = candidate.next_year if candidate <= now
          
      499. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    499. 
            

            
              
            

                candidate
          
      500. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    500. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      501. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    501.

    502. 
            

            
              
            

              # == Utilities
          
      503. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    503. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def calculate_distance(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2)
          
      504. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    504. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return 0 if lat1 == lat2 && lon1 == lon2
          
      505. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    505. 
            

            
              
            

                to_rad = Math::PI / 180.0
          
      506. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    506. 
            

            
              
            

                lat1 *= to_rad; lon1 *= to_rad
          
      507. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    507. 
            

            
              
            

                lat2 *= to_rad; lon2 *= to_rad
          
      508. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    508. 
            

            
              
            

                dlat = lat2 - lat1
          
      509. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    509. 
            

            
              
            

                dlon = lon2 - lon1
          
      510. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    510. 
            

            
              
            

                a = Math.sin(dlat / 2)**2 + Math.cos(lat1) * Math.cos(lat2) * Math.sin(dlon / 2)**2
          
      511. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    511. 
            

            
              
            

                c = 2 * Math.asin(Math.sqrt(a))
          
      512. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    512. 
            

            
              
            

                6_371_000 * c
          
      513. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    513. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      514. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    514. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      515.

                coaching_relationships_as_coach.or(coaching_relationships_as_client)
          
      57.

      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return false unless current_location

      120.

                    .where(status: :pending)
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                    .where("due_at < ?", Time.current)
          
      122.

              # Mark all notifications as read

              1
            

            
              
            

              def mark_all_notifications_read!
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                notification_logs.update_all(
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                  metadata: notification_logs.pluck(:metadata).map do |meta|
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                    parsed = JSON.parse(meta) rescue {}
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                    parsed.merge("read" => true).to_json
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      196.

              # Get notification statistics

              def notification_stats

      200.

      201.

      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205.

      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      207.

              # Update user's current location
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def update_location!(latitude, longitude, accuracy = nil)
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                user_locations.create!(
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                  latitude: latitude,
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                  longitude: longitude,
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                  accuracy: accuracy,
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                  recorded_at: Time.current
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

              # Get location history for a specific time period
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def location_history(start_time = 1.week.ago, end_time = Time.current)
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                user_locations.where(recorded_at: start_time..end_time).order(:recorded_at)
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

              # Check if user is at a specific saved location
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def at_location?(saved_location, current_latitude = nil, current_longitude = nil)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return false unless current_latitude && current_longitude
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use current location if not provided
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                current_lat = current_latitude || current_location&.latitude
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                current_lng = current_longitude || current_location&.longitude
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return false unless current_lat && current_lng
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate distance using Haversine formula
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                distance = calculate_distance(
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                  current_lat, current_lng,
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                  saved_location.latitude, saved_location.longitude
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                distance <= saved_location.radius_meters
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

              # Missing methods that tests expect
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def latitude
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
              115
            

            
              
            

                read_attribute(:latitude)
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def longitude

              def distance_to_saved_location(saved_location)

              def valid_timezone

    284.

                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 94
                
              
            

                return if timezone.blank?

              # Calculate distance between two points using Haversine formula
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def calculate_distance(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2)
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

                # Earth's radius in meters
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

                earth_radius = 6_371_000
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            
              
            

                # Convert degrees to radians
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
            

                lat1_rad = lat1 * Math::PI / 180
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            
              
            

                lat2_rad = lat2 * Math::PI / 180
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            
              
            

                delta_lat = (lat2 - lat1) * Math::PI / 180
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

                delta_lon = (lon2 - lon1) * Math::PI / 180
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            
              
            

                # Haversine formula
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            
              
            

                a = Math.sin(delta_lat / 2) ** 2 +
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            
              
            

                    Math.cos(lat1_rad) * Math.cos(lat2_rad) *
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            
              
            

                    Math.sin(delta_lon / 2) ** 2
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            
              
            

                c = 2 * Math.atan2(Math.sqrt(a), Math.sqrt(1 - a))
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            
              
            

                earth_radius * c
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def set_default_role
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            
              47
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 47
                
              
            

                self.role = "client" if role.blank?
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def generate_jti

                self.jti = SecureRandom.uuid

            class CoachingRelationshipPolicy

              def initialize(user, relationship)

    10.

            class MembershipPolicy < ApplicationPolicy

              def destroy?
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                # Can remove members if user can invite to the list
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                # OR if the membership belongs to the current user (self-removal)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25.

              class Scope < ApplicationPolicy::Scope
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                def resolve
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Users can only see memberships for lists they have access to
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31.

            class TaskPolicy < ApplicationPolicy
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              def show?
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

                return false unless record
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                # If deleted, only the list owner may view
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                if record.respond_to?(:status) && record.status.to_s == "deleted"
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                  return false unless user
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                  list_owner_id = record.list.user_id
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                  return list_owner_id == user.id

    10. 
            

            
              
            

                end

              def reassign?

                return false unless user
          
      57.

                # But coaches cannot reassign client's tasks
          
      60.

                if user.coach? && record.creator != user && record.list.user != user
          
      61.

                  return false
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                record.visible_to?(user) && record.list.editable_by?(user)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

              def change_visibility?
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                return false unless user
          
      68.

              class Scope < ApplicationPolicy::Scope
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                def resolve
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Lists the user can see (owner_id OR user_id) OR accepted shares
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  accessible_list_ids = List
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                    .left_outer_joins(:list_shares)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                    .where(
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                      "lists.user_id = :uid " \
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                      "OR (list_shares.user_id = :uid AND list_shares.status = 'accepted')",
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                      uid: user.id
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      83.

      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  rel = scope.where("tasks.deleted_at IS NULL")
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                             .where("tasks.list_id IN (?)", accessible_list_ids)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                             .includes(:list) # avoid N+1 when visible_to? looks at list
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                  # visible_to? is complex; keep it in Ruby

    90.

              private

              def role_for_current_user
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                if list.user == current_user
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  "owner"
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif current_user.coach? && list.shared_with?(current_user)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  "coach"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  "viewer"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

              def shared_coaches
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                return [] unless list.user == current_user
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                list.coaches.map { |coach| UserSerializer.new(coach).as_json }

              def derive_priority
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                return 3 if task.strict_mode && overdue?  # Urgent
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                return 2 if task.strict_mode               # High
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                return 1 if task.due_at && task.due_at < 24.hours.from_now  # Medium
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                0  # Low
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

              def overdue?
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                # Task is overdue if it has a due date in the past and is NOT completed
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                task.due_at.present? &&
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                task.due_at < Time.current &&
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                (task.status.nil? || task.status == "pending" || task.status == "in_progress")
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96.

              def minutes_overdue

    98. 
            

            
              
            

                return 0 unless overdue?
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                ((Time.current - task.due_at) / 60).to_i
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101.

              def completed_at_value
          
      175.

                # Use the actual completed_at field if it exists, otherwise fall back to updated_at

                if task.status == "done"

                # payload: a Ruby Hash that becomes your APNs JSON body, e.g. { aps: { alert: { title: "...", body: "..." }, sound: "default" } }
          
      38.

                #  apns_id:    a UUID you pass; APNs returns it back

                #  expiration: Unix epoch seconds when the notification expires (0 means immediately discard if not delivered)

                #  priority:   10 or 5

                # Returns: { ok: true, apns_id:, status: 200 } on success
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                #          { ok: false, status:, reason:, timestamp: } on error
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def send_notification(device_token, payload, push_type: DEFAULT_PUSH_TYPE, topic: nil, apns_id: nil, expiration: 0, priority: DEFAULT_PRIORITY)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  headers = {
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                    "authorization"  => "bearer #{jwt!}",
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                    "apns-topic"     => (topic || @bundle_id),
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    "apns-push-type" => push_type,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                    "apns-priority"  => priority.to_s,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    "content-type"   => "application/json"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  headers["apns-id"]        = apns_id if apns_id
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  headers["apns-expiration"]= expiration.to_s if expiration && expiration.to_i > 0
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  path    = "/3/device/#{device_token}"
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  body    = JSON.generate(payload)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Use standard Net::HTTP with HTTP/2 support
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  uri = URI("https://#{apns_host}/#{path}")
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                  http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                  http.use_ssl = true
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                  http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_PEER
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                  request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  headers.each { |k, v| request[k] = v }
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  request.body = body
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  response = http.request(request)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  status = response.code.to_i
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  apns_id_hdr = response["apns-id"]
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  if status == 200
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                    { ok: true, apns_id: apns_id_hdr, status: status }
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                    err = parse_error(response.body)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                    { ok: false, status: status, reason: err["reason"], timestamp: err["timestamp"], apns_id: apns_id_hdr }
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Connection errors, etc.

    84.

      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      86.

                def apns_host
