                def load_ec_key!(p8)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
            

                  key = if File.file?(p8)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    OpenSSL::PKey.read(File.read(p8))
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                    OpenSSL::PKey.read(p8)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  unless key.is_a?(OpenSSL::PKey::EC) && key.private?
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise ArgumentError, "APNS_CERT_PATH must be an EC private key (.p8) with a private component"
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  key
          
      107.

      108.

      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109.

                def jwt!
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  now = Time.now.to_i
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                  synchronize do
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if @jwt.nil? || (now - @jwt_iat) >= TOKEN_TTL_SECONDS
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                      headers = { kid: @key_id, alg: "ES256", typ: "JWT" }
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                      claims  = { iss: @team_id, iat: now } # APNs only wants iss + iat
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                      @jwt    = JWT.encode(claims, @p8_key, "ES256", headers)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                      @jwt_iat = now
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                    @jwt
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def parse_error(body)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  JSON.parse(body)

    124. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue JSON::ParserError
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  { "reason" => "UnparseableResponse", "raw" => body.to_s }
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

            end

              def push(device_token:, title:, body:, payload: {})
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                notification = Apnotic::Notification.new(device_token)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                notification.topic = APNS_P8[:bundle_id]

      18.

                notification.sound = "default"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                notification.custom_payload = payload
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                @connection.push(notification).tap { @connection.close }
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            end

              def task_changed(task, event:, current_user: nil)

                if current_user

              # Normalized task.updated event with full payload

              def task_updated(task, current_user: nil)

              # Other normalized events

              def task_created(task, current_user: nil)

              def authorize!(action)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                policy = CoachingRelationshipPolicy.new(@actor, @rel)

    44. 
            

            
              
            

                raise Pundit::NotAuthorizedError unless policy.public_send(action)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

              def enqueue_notification(event)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                # Map internal events to NotificationService methods
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                method = case event
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                when :relationship_requested then :coaching_invitation_sent
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                when :relationship_accepted then :coaching_invitation_accepted
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                when :relationship_declined then :coaching_invitation_declined
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                when :relationship_cancelled then :coaching_invitation_declined
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                when :relationship_terminated then :coaching_invitation_declined
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                           Rails.logger.warn "Unknown coaching relationship event: #{event}"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                           return
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                NotificationJob.perform_later(method.to_s, @rel.id)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

            end

                return 0.0 if total.zero?

              class TooExpensiveError < StandardError; end
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(user:, window: nil, sections: [])
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                @user = user
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                @window = window || { from: 1.year.ago, to: Time.current, tz: "UTC" }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                @sections = sections
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

              def call
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                # Preload everything you need in as few queries as possible
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                lists = @user.owned_lists.select(:id, :name, :updated_at)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                list_ids = lists.pluck(:id)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                tasks = Task.where(list_id: list_ids).where(created_at: @window[:from]..@window[:to])
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                # Build your payload based on requested sections
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                data = {}
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                if @sections.empty? || @sections.include?("inbox")
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  data[:inbox_count] = tasks.where(completed_at: nil).count
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                if @sections.empty? || @sections.include?("overdue")
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                  overdue_count = tasks.where("due_at < ? AND completed_at IS NULL", Time.zone.now).count
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  data[:overdue_count] = overdue_count
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  data[:overdue_tasks_count] = overdue_count # Legacy field
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                if @sections.empty? || @sections.include?("velocity")
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  data[:velocity] = velocity_series(tasks)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41.

                if @sections.empty? || @sections.include?("streaks")
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  data[:streaks] = streaks(tasks)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                # Add role-specific data
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                if @user.client?
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  data.merge!(client_specific_data(lists, tasks))
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  data.merge!(coach_specific_data(lists, tasks))
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                # Compute cache helpers
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                lm = [ lists.maximum(:updated_at), tasks.maximum(:updated_at) ].compact.max
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                dig = Digest::SHA1.hexdigest([ @user.id, @window[:from].to_i, @window[:to].to_i, data.hash ].join(":"))
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                { **data, digest: dig, last_modified: lm }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::QueryCanceled, ActiveRecord::StatementInvalid
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                raise TooExpensiveError
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

              def stats(group_by: "day", limit: 30)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                # Preload data efficiently
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                lists = @user.owned_lists.select(:id, :updated_at)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                list_ids = lists.pluck(:id)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                tasks = Task.where(list_id: list_ids).where(created_at: @window[:from]..@window[:to])
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                # Build time series data
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                series = build_time_series(tasks, group_by, limit)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                # Build legacy stats format for backward compatibility
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                stats_data = {
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  total_tasks: tasks.count,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  completed_tasks: tasks.where.not(completed_at: nil).count,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  overdue_tasks: tasks.where("due_at < ? AND completed_at IS NULL", Time.zone.now).count,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  completion_rate: calculate_completion_rate(tasks),
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  average_completion_time: 0, # TODO: Implement
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                  tasks_by_priority: {
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                    urgent: 0,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                    high: 0,
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                    medium: 0,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                    low: 0
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                # Add role-specific stats
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                if @user.client?
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  stats_data.merge!(client_stats_data(tasks))
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                  stats_data.merge!(coach_stats_data(tasks))
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                # Compute cache helpers
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                lm = [ lists.maximum(:updated_at), tasks.maximum(:updated_at) ].compact.max
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                dig = Digest::SHA1.hexdigest([ @user.id, @window[:from].to_i, @window[:to].to_i, group_by, limit, series.hash ].join(":"))
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                { **stats_data, series: series, digest: dig, last_modified: lm }
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::QueryCanceled, ActiveRecord::StatementInvalid
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                raise TooExpensiveError
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

              def client_specific_data(lists, tasks)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  coaches_count: @user.coaches.count,
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  completion_rate_this_week: calculate_completion_rate(tasks),
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  recent_activity: recent_activity_summary,
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  upcoming_deadlines: upcoming_deadlines_summary(tasks),
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Legacy fields for backward compatibility
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  blocking_tasks_count: tasks.joins(:escalation)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                                             .where(item_escalations: { blocking_app: true })
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                                             .count,
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  awaiting_explanation_count: tasks.where(requires_explanation_if_missed: true)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                                                  .where("due_at < ? AND completed_at IS NULL", Time.current)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                                                  .count
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

              def coach_specific_data(lists, tasks)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                # Simplified coach data to avoid expensive queries
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  clients_count: @user.clients.count,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  total_overdue_tasks: 0, # TODO: Implement efficiently
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  pending_explanations: 0, # TODO: Implement efficiently
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  active_relationships: @user.coaching_relationships_as_coach.count,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  recent_client_activity: [] # TODO: Implement efficiently
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

              def velocity_series(tasks)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                # Group completed tasks by date
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                completed_tasks = tasks.where.not(completed_at: nil)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .group("DATE(completed_at)")
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .count
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                # Fill in missing dates with zeros
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                (@window[:from].to_date..@window[:to].to_date).map do |date|
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                    date: date.iso8601,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                    completed: completed_tasks[date] || 0
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

              def streaks(tasks)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                completed_dates = tasks.where.not(completed_at: nil)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .pluck(:completed_at)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .map(&:to_date)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .uniq
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .sort
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                return { current: 0, longest: 0 } if completed_dates.empty?
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                current_streak = 0
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                longest_streak = 0
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                temp_streak = 0
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate streaks
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                completed_dates.each_with_index do |date, index|
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                  if index == 0 || date == completed_dates[index - 1] + 1.day
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                    temp_streak += 1
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                    longest_streak = [ longest_streak, temp_streak ].max
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                    temp_streak = 1
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                longest_streak = [ longest_streak, temp_streak ].max
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate current streak (from today backwards)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                today = Time.zone.now.to_date
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                current_streak = 0
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                check_date = today
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                while completed_dates.include?(check_date)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                  current_streak += 1
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                  check_date -= 1.day
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                { current: current_streak, longest: longest_streak }
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

              def build_time_series(tasks, group_by, limit)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                case group_by
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                when "day"
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                  group_by_day(tasks, limit)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                when "week"
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                  group_by_week(tasks, limit)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                when "month"
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                  group_by_month(tasks, limit)
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                  group_by_day(tasks, limit)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

              def group_by_day(tasks, limit)
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                completed_tasks = tasks.where.not(completed_at: nil)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .group("DATE(completed_at)")
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .count
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                (@window[:from].to_date..@window[:to].to_date)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                  .last(limit)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                  .map do |date|
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                      period: date.iso8601,
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                      completed: completed_tasks[date] || 0
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

              def group_by_week(tasks, limit)
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                completed_tasks = tasks.where.not(completed_at: nil)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .group("DATE_TRUNC('week', completed_at)")
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .count
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                weeks = []
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                current_week = @window[:from].beginning_of_week
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                end_week = @window[:to].end_of_week
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                while current_week <= end_week && weeks.length < limit
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                  week_start = current_week.to_date
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                  week_end = (current_week + 6.days).to_date
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                  weeks << {
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                    period: "#{week_start.iso8601}/#{week_end.iso8601}",
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                    completed: completed_tasks[current_week] || 0
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                  current_week += 1.week
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                weeks
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

              def group_by_month(tasks, limit)
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                completed_tasks = tasks.where.not(completed_at: nil)
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .group("DATE_TRUNC('month', completed_at)")
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .count
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                months = []
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                current_month = @window[:from].beginning_of_month
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                end_month = @window[:to].end_of_month
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                while current_month <= end_month && months.length < limit
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                  months << {
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                    period: current_month.strftime("%Y-%m"),
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                    completed: completed_tasks[current_month] || 0
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                  current_month = current_month.next_month
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                months
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

              def calculate_completion_rate(tasks)
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                total = tasks.count
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

                return 0 if total == 0
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

                completed = tasks.where.not(completed_at: nil).count
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

                (completed.to_f / total * 100).round(1)
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

              def recent_activity_summary
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get recent task events for the user
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                recent_events = TaskEvent.includes(:task)
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

                                         .joins(:task)
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

                                         .where(tasks: { list: @user.lists })
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

                                         .where("task_events.created_at >= ?", @window[:from])
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

                                         .order(created_at: :desc)
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
            

                                         .limit(5)
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      273.

                recent_events.map do |event|
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275.

      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

                    task_title: event.task.title,
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277.

      278.

              def upcoming_deadlines_summary(tasks)
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get tasks due in the next 7 days
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
            

                upcoming_tasks = tasks.includes(:list)
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .where(status: :pending)
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .where("due_at BETWEEN ? AND ?", Time.current, 7.days.from_now)
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .order(:due_at)
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .limit(5)
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
            

                upcoming_tasks.map do |task|
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                    id: task.id,
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: task.title,
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

                    due_at: task.due_at,
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

                    list_name: task.list.name,
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

                    days_until_due: ((task.due_at - Time.current) / 1.day).round(1)
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301.

              def recent_client_activity_summary(client_tasks)

              def coach_stats_data(tasks)

    332. 
            

            
              
            

                                  .where(created_at: @window[:from]..@window[:to])

                  {
          
      337.

      340.

                    completed_tasks: 0, # TODO: Implement efficiently
          
      341.

      342.

            class DeviceManagementService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(user:)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                @user = user
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              def register(token:, platform:, locale: nil, app_version: nil, device_name: nil, os_version: nil, bundle_id: nil, fcm_token: nil, apns_token: nil)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                Device.transaction do
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Normalize platform and default to ios if empty
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  platform = platform.to_s.downcase.strip
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  platform = "ios" if platform.blank?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Find existing device by any token (APNs or FCM)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  device = Device.find_by(user: @user, apns_token: token) ||
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                           Device.find_by(user: @user, fcm_token: token)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Create new device if not found
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  device ||= Device.new(user: @user)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Set platform-specific attributes
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  if platform == "ios"
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                    device.apns_token = token
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                    device.fcm_token = fcm_token if fcm_token.present?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                    device.bundle_id = bundle_id.present? ? bundle_id : "com.example.app"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                    device.fcm_token = token
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                    # For Android, also set APNs token if provided
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                    device.apns_token = apns_token if apns_token.present?
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                    device.bundle_id = bundle_id.present? ? bundle_id : "com.example.app"
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Set common attributes
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  device.platform = platform
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  device.app_version = app_version
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  device.device_name = device_name
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  device.os_version = os_version
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  device.last_seen_at = Time.current
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  device.save!
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  device
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

              def touch!(token:, platform:)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                token_field = platform == "ios" ? :apns_token : :fcm_token
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                Device.where(user: @user, token_field => token).update_all(last_seen_at: Time.current)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

              def revoke(token:, platform:)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                token_field = platform == "ios" ? :apns_token : :fcm_token
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                Device.where(user: @user, token_field => token).delete_all
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

              def find_by_token(token:, platform:)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                token_field = platform == "ios" ? :apns_token : :fcm_token
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                Device.where(user: @user, token_field => token).first
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

              def list
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                @user.devices.includes(:user)
          
      62.

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      64.

              def update_device(device:, attributes:)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                device.update!(attributes.merge(last_seen_at: Time.current))
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                device
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      69.

              def send_test_push(device:)
          
      70.

                begin

    app/services/location_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2.

    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class LocationService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              EARTH_RADIUS_M = 6_371_000.0
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(lat:, lon:)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @lat = to_rad(lat)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                @lon = to_rad(lon)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              def distance_to(lat:, lon:)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                lat2 = to_rad(lat)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                lon2 = to_rad(lon)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                dlat = lat2 - @lat
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                dlon = lon2 - @lon
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                a = Math.sin(dlat / 2)**2 + Math.cos(@lat) * Math.cos(lat2) * Math.sin(dlon / 2)**2
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                2 * EARTH_RADIUS_M * Math.atan2(Math.sqrt(a), Math.sqrt(1 - a))
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

              def within?(center_lat:, center_lon:, radius_m:)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                distance_to(lat: center_lat, lon: center_lon) <= radius_m
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

              def to_rad(v) = v.to_f * Math::PI / 180.0
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      28.
