                      type: "explanation_submitted",
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                      message: "Client submitted explanation"
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                # ==========================================
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                # ESCALATION & REMINDER NOTIFICATIONS
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                # ==========================================
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                # Regular reminder for overdue task
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                def send_reminder(task, escalation_level)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                  client = task.list.user
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  emoji = case escalation_level
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "normal" then "⏰"
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "warning" then "⚠️"
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "critical" then "🚨"
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "blocking" then "🛑"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                  else "⏰"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Use critical interruption for blocking
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  interruption_level = case escalation_level
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "blocking" then "critical"
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "critical" then "time-sensitive"
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                  else "active"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                  sound = escalation_level == "blocking" ? "critical.caf" : "default"
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                  send_apns_notification(
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: "#{emoji} Task Reminder",
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                    body: task.title,
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                    data: {
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "reminder",
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                      task_id: task.id,
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                      escalation_level: escalation_level,
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                      minutes_overdue: task.minutes_overdue,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                      notification_count: task.escalation.notification_count
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                    badge: calculate_badge_count(client),
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                    sound: sound,
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                    critical: escalation_level == "blocking",
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                    interruption_level: interruption_level,
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                    category: "TASK_REMINDER"
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_notification(
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                    task: task,
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                    type: "reminder",
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "Reminder sent (#{escalation_level})",
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                    metadata: {
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                      escalation_level: escalation_level,
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                      notification_count: task.escalation.notification_count
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                # When app gets blocked due to critical overdue task
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                def app_blocking_started(task)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                  client = task.list.user
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                  send_apns_notification(
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: "🛑 Critical Task Overdue",
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                    body: "Complete '#{task.title}' to continue using the app",
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                    data: {
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "app_blocking",
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                      task_id: task.id,
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                      blocking: true
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                    badge: calculate_badge_count(client),
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                    sound: "critical.caf",
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                    critical: true,
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                    interruption_level: "critical",
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                    category: "APP_BLOCKING"
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_notification(
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                    task: task,
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                    type: "app_blocking",
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "App blocking started for critical task"
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                # Alert coaches that client has critical overdue task
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                def alert_coaches_of_overdue(task)
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                  task.list.coaches.each do |coach|
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                    relationship = task.list.user.relationship_with_coach(coach)
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                    next unless relationship&.notify_on_missed_deadline?
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                    next unless task.visible_to?(coach)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                    send_apns_notification(
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                      user: coach,
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: "🚨 Client Task Critical",
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                      body: "#{task.list.user.name}'s task '#{task.title}' is #{task.minutes_overdue} min overdue",
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                      data: {
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                        type: "coach_alert_critical",
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                        task_id: task.id,
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                        client_id: task.list.user.id,
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

                        minutes_overdue: task.minutes_overdue,
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                        escalation_level: task.escalation.escalation_level
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                      },
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                      sound: "default",
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                      category: "COACH_ALERT_CRITICAL"
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                    log_notification(
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

                      task: task,
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

                      user: coach,
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "coach_alert_critical",
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                      message: "Critical overdue alert sent to coach"
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

                # ==========================================
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

                # LOCATION-BASED NOTIFICATIONS
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

                # ==========================================
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

                def location_based_reminder(task, event)
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

                  client = task.list.user
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

                  message = case event
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

                  when :arrival
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

                              "You're at #{task.location_name}! Don't forget: #{task.title}"
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            
              
            

                  when :departure
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
            

                              "Leaving #{task.location_name}. Did you complete: #{task.title}?"
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

                              task.title
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

                  send_push_notification(
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: "📍 Location Reminder",
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

                    body: message,
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

                    data: {
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "location_reminder",
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

                      task_id: task.id,
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            
              
            

                      event: event.to_s,
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
            

                      location_name: task.location_name
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                    priority: "high"
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_notification(
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

                    task: task,
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            
              
            

                    type: "location_reminder",
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "Location-based reminder (#{event})",
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            
              
            

                    metadata: {
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            
              
            

                      event: event,
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

                      location: task.location_name
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            
              
            

                # ==========================================
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            
              
            

                # RECURRING TASK NOTIFICATIONS
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            
              
            

                # ==========================================
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            
              
            

                def recurring_task_generated(task)
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            
              
            

                  client = task.list.user
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Only notify if due soon (within 24 hours)
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            
              
            

                  return unless task.due_at.present? && task.due_at < 24.hours.from_now
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            
              
            

                  send_push_notification(
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: "🔄 Recurring Task",
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            
              
            

                    body: task.title,
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            
              
            

                    data: {
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "recurring_task_generated",
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            
              
            

                      task_id: task.id,
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            
              
            

                      due_at: task.due_at.iso8601
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_notification(
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            
              
            

                    task: task,
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            
              
            

                    type: "recurring_task_generated",
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "New recurring task instance created"
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            
              
            

                # ==========================================
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            
              
            

                # COACHING RELATIONSHIP NOTIFICATIONS
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            
              
            

                # ==========================================
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            
              
            

                def coaching_invitation_sent(relationship)
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            
              
            

                  recipient = if relationship.invited_by == "coach"
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            
              
            

                                relationship.client
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            
              
            

                                relationship.coach
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            
              
            

                  end

                def send_apns_notification(user:, title:, body:, data: {}, badge: nil, sound: "default", critical: false, interruption_level: "active", category: nil)
          
      541. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    541. 
            

            
              
            

                  return unless user.devices.ios.any?
          
      542. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    542. 
            

            
              
            

                  return unless APNS_CLIENT.present?
          
      543. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    543. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      544. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    544. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Build notification payload
          
      545. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    545. 
            

            
              
            

                  aps_payload = {
          
      546. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    546. 
            

            
              
            

                    alert: {
          
      547. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    547. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: title,
          
      548. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    548. 
            

            
              
            

                      body: body
          
      549. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    549. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      550. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    550. 
            

            
              
            

                    sound: sound,
          
      551. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    551. 
            

            
              
            

                    badge: badge || calculate_badge_count(user)

                  }

                  if critical

                    aps_payload[:sound] = {

                      critical: 1,

                  if interruption_level != "active"

                    begin

                      # Use our custom APNs client

      595. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    595. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.info "[NotificationService] APNs sent to user ##{user.id}: #{title}"
          
      596. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    596. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.debug "[NotificationService] APNs Response: #{response.inspect}"
          
      597. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    597. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      598. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    598. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Check for errors

                      if response[:status] == 410 # Unregistered

      602.

    604. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      605. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    605. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      606. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    606. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      607. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    607. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "[NotificationService] APNs error sending to user ##{user.id}: #{e.message}"

    608. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")

                    end

                  end

                def log_notification(task:, user:, type:, message:, metadata: {})

                  NotificationLog.create!(

                def calculate_badge_count(user)
          
      709. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    709. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Return count of incomplete un-snoozable tasks
          
      710. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    710. 
            

            
              
            

                  Task.joins(:list)
          
      711. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    711. 
            

            
              
            

                      .where(lists: { user_id: user.id })
          
      712. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    712. 
            

            
              
            

                      .where(completed_at: nil)
          
      713. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    713. 
            

            
              
            

                      .where(can_be_snoozed: false)
          
      714. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    714. 
            

            
              
            

                      .count
          
      715. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    715. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      716. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    716. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      717. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    717. 
            

            
              
            

                def build_summary_message(summary)
          
      718. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    718. 
            

            
              
            

                  parts = []
          
      719. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    719. 
            

            
              
            

                  parts << "✅ #{summary.tasks_completed} completed" if summary.tasks_completed > 0
          
      720. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    720. 
            

            
              
            

                  parts << "❌ #{summary.tasks_missed} missed" if summary.tasks_missed > 0
          
      721. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    721. 
            

            
              
            

                  parts << "⏰ #{summary.tasks_overdue} overdue" if summary.tasks_overdue > 0
          
      722. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    722. 
            

            
              
            

                  parts << "📊 #{summary.completion_rate}% completion rate"
          
      723. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    723. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      724. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    724. 
            

            
              
            

                  parts.join(", ")
          
      725. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    725. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      726. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    726. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      727. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    727. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      728.

                def self.apns

    6. 
            

            
              
            

                  @apns ||= Apns::Client.new

                def self.send_example(device_token, title:, body:)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  payload = {
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                    aps: {
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                      alert: { title: title, body: body },
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                      sound: "default",
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                      badge: 1
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  apns.send_notification(device_token, payload, push_type: "alert")

            class TaskCreationService

    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(list, user, params)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                @list = list
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                @user = user
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @params = params
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              def call
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                # Preserve subtasks before normalize_parameters
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                subtasks = @params[:subtasks]
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                normalize_parameters
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                create_task
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                create_subtasks(subtasks) if subtasks.present?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                setup_notifications

                @task

              private

    22. 
            

            
              
            

              def normalize_parameters
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs = @params.to_h
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                # Handle iOS-specific parameters

              def handle_ios_parameters
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                # iOS uses 'name' instead of 'title'
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs[:title] = @params[:name] if @params[:name].present?
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                # iOS uses 'description' instead of 'note'
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs[:note] = @params[:description] if @params[:description].present?
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                # Handle different date formats
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                handle_date_parameters
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

              def handle_date_parameters
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs[:due_at] = extract_due_at(@params)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

              def extract_due_at(h)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                return parse_epoch(h[:dueDate]) if h.key?(:dueDate) # epoch seconds
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                return parse_time(h[:due_date]) if h.key?(:due_date) # ISO8601
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                return parse_time(h[:due_at])   if h.key?(:due_at)   # ISO8601
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ArgumentError
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

              def parse_epoch(v)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if v.blank?
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                Time.at(v.to_i)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ArgumentError
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

              def parse_time(v)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if v.blank?
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                case v
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                when Time   then v.in_time_zone
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                when String
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                  begin
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                    Time.iso8601(v).in_time_zone # preserves instant if "Z"/offset included
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue ArgumentError
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                    Time.zone.parse(v.to_s)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue StandardError
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

              def set_default_values
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs[:strict_mode] = true if @attrs[:strict_mode].nil?
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                # Handle boolean attributes
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs[:can_be_snoozed] = boolean(@attrs[:can_be_snoozed]) unless @attrs[:can_be_snoozed].nil?
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs[:requires_explanation_if_missed] = boolean(@attrs[:requires_explanation_if_missed]) unless @attrs[:requires_explanation_if_missed].nil?
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs[:location_based] = boolean(@attrs[:location_based]) unless @attrs[:location_based].nil?
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs[:is_recurring] = boolean(@attrs[:is_recurring]) unless @attrs[:is_recurring].nil?
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

              def boolean(value)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                case value
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                when true, false then value
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                when "true", "1", 1 then true
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                when "false", "0", 0, nil then false
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                else false
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

              def clean_parameters
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                # Remove iOS-specific parameters that shouldn't go to the model
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs.delete(:name)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs.delete(:dueDate)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs.delete(:description)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs.delete(:due_date)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                @attrs.delete(:subtasks)  # Handle subtasks separately
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

              def create_task
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                @task = @list.tasks.build(@attrs)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                @task.creator = @user
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                # Set default due_at if not provided and required
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                if @task.due_at.blank? && @task.strict_mode
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                  @task.due_at = 1.hour.from_now
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                @task.save!
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

              def create_subtasks(subtasks)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                subtasks.each do |subtask_title|
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Truncate title if too long
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  title = subtask_title.to_s
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  title = title[0, 255] if title.length > 255
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  @task.subtasks.create!(
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                    list: @list,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                    creator: @user,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: title,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                    due_at: @task.due_at,
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                    strict_mode: @task.strict_mode
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      131.

              def setup_notifications

            class CleanupCompletedTasksWorker
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Worker
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_options queue: :low, retry: 1
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                # Optional: Archive or delete very old completed tasks
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                # Be careful with this - users might want history!
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                cutoff_date = 1.year.ago
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find completed non-recurring tasks older than 1 year
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                old_tasks = Task.where.not(completed_at: nil)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                                .where("completed_at < ?", cutoff_date)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                                .where(recurring_template_id: nil) # Don't delete recurring instances
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                count = old_tasks.count
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[CleanupCompletedTasksWorker] Found #{count} tasks to archive"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                # Instead of deleting, you might want to:
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                # 1. Move to archive table
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                # 2. Export to S3
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                # 3. Just leave them (storage is cheap)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                # For now, let's just log
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[CleanupCompletedTasksWorker] Archiving disabled - keeping all completed tasks"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

            end

            class CleanupOldNotificationsWorker
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Worker
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_options queue: :low, retry: 1
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[CleanupOldNotificationsWorker] Starting cleanup"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                # Delete notification logs older than 90 days
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                cutoff_date = 90.days.ago
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                deleted_count = NotificationLog.where("created_at < ?", cutoff_date).delete_all
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[CleanupOldNotificationsWorker] Deleted #{deleted_count} old notification logs"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                # Delete old user location records (keep last 30 days)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                location_cutoff = 30.days.ago
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                deleted_locations = UserLocation.where("recorded_at < ?", location_cutoff).delete_all
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[CleanupOldNotificationsWorker] Deleted #{deleted_locations} old location records"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                # Clean up old escalations for completed tasks
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                ItemEscalation.joins(:task)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                              .where.not(tasks: { completed_at: nil })
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                              .where("tasks.completed_at < ?", 30.days.ago)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                              .delete_all
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[CleanupOldNotificationsWorker] Cleanup completed"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

              end
